translation.en: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translation.ha: A ranar Litinin, masana kimiyya daga Kwalejin Kimiyya ta Jami'ar Stanford suka sanar da kirkirar sabon kayan aikin bincike wanda zai iya rarrabe kwayoyin hallita ta nau'i: ƙaramin cip mai buguwa wanda za'a iya kera ta yin amfani da daidaitattun firinta na inkjet don yiwuwar kusan Amurka ɗaya kowannensu.

translation.en: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translation.ha: Manyan masu bincike sun ce wannan na iya sa a gano ciwon daji, tarin fuka, HIV da zazzaɓin cizon sauro da wuri ga marasa lafiya a ƙasashe masu ƙarancin kuɗaɗen shiga, inda adadin warkewa na cututtuka kamar sankarar nono zai iya kasancewa rabin na ƙasashe masu arziki.

translation.en: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translation.ha: Jirgin JAS 39C Gripen ya fado a kan hanyar jirgi da misalin karfe 9:30 na safe lokacin kasa (UTC 0230) kuma ya fashe, wanda ya haddasa rufe filin jirgin saman jiragen kasuwanci.

translation.en: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translation.ha: An gano cewa matukin jirgin shine Shugaban Rundunar Sojoji Dilokrit Pattavee.

translation.en: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translation.ha: Kafofin watsa labarai na cikin gida sun ce wata motar kashe gobara ta tashi a sama yayin da take mai da martani.

translation.en: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translation.ha: Vidal dan shekara 28 ya koma Barcelona a kakar wasanni ukun da suka wuce, daga kungiyar Sevilla.

translation.en: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translation.ha: Vidal ya buga wasanni 49 wa kungiyar tun komawarsa birnin tarayyar Catalan.

translation.en: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translation.ha: Zanga-zangan ya fara ne misalin ƙarfe 11:00 agogon gida (UTC+1) akan Whitehall mai kallon tashar ‘yan sanda kofar shiga zuwa Layin Downing, Mazaunin Firam minister na hukuma.

translation.en: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translation.ha: Jim kadan bayan karfe 11:00, masu zanga-zangar sun hana zirga-zirgar ababen hawa a kan motar arewa a Whitehall.

translation.en: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translation.ha: Wajen karfe 11:20 sai yan sandan su ka umarci masu zanga zangar su koma gefen titi saboda kada su shiga hakkin ababen hawa da ke zirga zirga a kan titin.

translation.en: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translation.ha: Wajen 11:29, zanga-zangar ta koma Whitehall, gaba da dandalin Trafalgar, a wajajen teku, gittawa ta Aldwych kuma ta saman Kingsway zuwa Holborn inda jam'iyyar zaman dako ke gudanar da taron bazararsu a dakin otal ɗin Grand Connaught.

translation.en: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translation.ha: Sakamakon nasarar kai da kai na Nadal kan dan kanada 7–2.

translation.ha: Kwanan nan ya sha kayi a hannun Raonic a Brisbane Open.

translation.ha: Nadal ya sami makuna 88% a wasan wanda ya ci makuna 76 a karo na farko.

translation.en: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translation.ha: “Panama Papers” wata laima ce wadda ta kunshi takardu sama da miliyan goma na wani kamfanin lauyoyi na Panama, Mossack Fonseca, da aka tseguntawa yan jarida a shekarar 2016.

translation.en: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translation.ha: Rubutattun hujjoji sun nuna cewa bankuna sha hudu ne su ka taimakawa abokan hurdarsu masu karfin arziki boye dukiyoyi na biliyoyin dalolin Amurka don gujewa biyan haraji da sauran dokoki.

translation.en: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translation.ha: Jaridar The Guardian ta Birtaniya ta ce Bankin Deutsche ne yake tafiyar da daya bisa uku na kaso 1200 na kamfanonin Shell da aka yi amfani da su wajen cimma wannan.

translation.en: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translation.ha: An yi zanga-zanga a duk duniya, kara ta laifuka daban-daban, da shugabannin gwamnatocin Iceland da Pakistan duk sun sauka.

translation.en: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translation.ha: An haife shi a Hong Kong, Ma ya yi karatu a Jami'ar New York da Makarantar Koyon Aikin Shari’a ta Harvard kuma ya taɓa riƙe katin zama a Amurka na dindindin “Green card”.

translation.en: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translation.ha: Hsieh ya yi nuni a lokacin zaben cewa Ma na iya tserewa daga kasar yayin rikici.

translation.en: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translation.ha: Hsieh kuma ya bayar da hujjar cewa wannan hoton Ma ya fi salo abubuwa.

translation.en: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translation.ha: Duk da wadannan zarge-zargen, Ma won yana aiki a shafin inda yake ta kiran a samu alaka ta kusa da ainihin kasar China.

translation.en: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translation.ha: Yau dan wasan da ya fi nuna ƙwazo shi ne Alex Ovechkin na Washinton Capitals.

translation.en: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translation.ha: Ya ci ƙwallaye 2 da kuma 2 da ya taimaka aka ci a nasarar wasan Washington 5-3 akan Atlanta Thrashers.

translation.en: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translation.ha: Taimakon Ovechkin na farko a daren ta kasance sanadiyar lashe wasa ta rookie Nicklas Backstrom;

translation.en: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translation.ha: kwallo na biyu da ya shigar da shi a daren shi ne na 60 a kakar wasanni, haka nan ya zama ɗan wasa na farko da zai shigar da kwallaye 60 ko fiye da haka a cikin wata kakar wasanni tun daga 1995-96, a lokacin da Jaromir Jagr da Mario Lemieux kowane a cikinsu ya kai wancan matakin.

translation.en: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translation.ha: An bai wa Batten matsayi na 190 a jerin sunayen Yan Amurka 400 mafi kudi a shekarar 2008 inda aka kiyasta dukiyarsa ta kai biliyan $2.3.

translation.en: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translation.ha: Ya kammala karatun sa daga Kwalejin Zane da kimiya na jami’ar Virginia a 1950 kuma yana daga cikin manyan masu taimaka wa cibiyar.

translation.en: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translation.ha: An kone kurkukun Abu Ghraib na Iraq lokacin hargitsi.

translation.en: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translation.ha: Kurkukun ya yi ƙaurin suna bayan an gano cin zarafin fursunoni da ake yi a can bayan dakarun Amurka sun karɓi iko.

translation.en: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translation.ha: Piquet Jr. ya fadi a gasar Grand Prix ta 2008 jim kadan bayan dakatawar wucin-gadi ta wuri da aka yi wa Fernando Alonso, inda ake fito da motar agaji.

translation.en: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translation.ha: Yayin da motocin da ke gaban Alonso suka shiga don shan mai a ƙarƙashin motar mai ba da kariya, sai ya matsa sama don ya ɗauki nasara.

translation.en: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation.ha: An kori Piquet Jr. bayan gasar Hungarian Grand Prix ta 2009.

translation.en: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translation.ha: Daidai ƙarfe 8:46 na safe, wani yanayin shuru ya faɗo ko'ina cikin birnin, yana alamar daidai lokacin kamar farkon bugawar manufan jirgin.

translation.en: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translation.ha: An kunna katako biyu na haske don nuna sama dukkan dare.

translation.en: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translation.ha: Aiki yana cigaba da gudana na gina sababbin dogayen benaye biyar a wurin, tare da cibiyar sufuri da kuma wurin shaƙatawa na tunawa a tsakiya.

translation.en: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translation.ha: Shirin PBS ya ci lambobin yabo kimanin dozin biyu na Emmy, ya kuma kasance kawai a bayan shirin Sesame Street da Shirin Mister Rogers Neighborhood wajen dadewa ana yinsa.

translation.en: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translation.ha: Kowane aukuwar shirin zai mayar da hankali kan wani jigon wani littafi na musamman sannan zata bincika jigon ta hanyan labarai masu yawa.

translation.en: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translation.ha: Kowane shirin zai ba da shawarwarin littattafa wanda ya kamata yara su nema idan sun je ɗakin karatu.

translation.en: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translation.ha: John Grant, daga WNED Buffalo (yayin Karanta tashar gida ta Rainbow) ya ce “Karanta Rainbow ya koya wa yara dalilin karatu, son karatu - [wasan kwaikwayo] ya karfafa wa yara gwiwa su dauki littafi su karanta.”

translation.en: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translation.ha: Yawanci sun gaskanta, tare da John Grant, da cewa kudade da matsawa a fasaha na shirye-shiryen talabijin na taimakawa zuwa karshen jere.

translation.en: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translation.ha: Guguwar na nisan kimanin mil 645 (kilomita 1040) a yamma da tsibirin Cape Verde, ana tsammanin za ta washe kafin ta kai doron kasa inji masu hasashen yanayi.

translation.en: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu iskar guguwar Fred na tafiya da saurin da ya kai mil 105 cikin awa guda (165 km/h) inda ta doshi arewa-maso-yamma.

translation.en: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
translation.ha: Guguwar Fred ita ce guguwar teku mafi karfi da aka taba gani tun sanda aka fara amfani da tauraron Dan Adam, kuma guguwa ta uku wadda ake da bayananta da ta faru a gabashin 35°W.

translation.en: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
translation.ha: Ranar 24 ga Satumba, 1759, Arthur Guinness ya sanya hannu kan yarjejeniyar hayar shekara 9,000 da kamfanin Barasa na St Jame’s Gate da ke Dublin a kasar Ireland.

translation.en: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
translation.ha: Bayan shekaru 250, Guinness ya bunƙasa zuwa wani kasuwancin duniya da ke samun sama da biliyan 10 na euro (US$14.7 biliyan) kowace shekara.

translation.en: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
translation.ha: Jonny Reid, direba ne na kungiyar A1GP New Zealand, a yau dan shekara 48 din ya kafa tarihi na mafi gudu a kan gadar Aukland Harbor Bridge, wanda bai keta doka ba.

translation.en: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
translation.ha: Mista Reid ya yi kokarin tuka Black Beauty, motar A1GP ta New Zealand, a gudu na sama da 160km / h ninki bakwai a bisa gadan.

translation.en: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
translation.ha: 'Yan sanda a New Zealand sun sami matsalar yin amfani da bindigoginsu na radar masu sauri don gane irin gudun da Mr Reid ya ke yi, lokaci daya da yan sandan suka yi nasarar auna gudun Mr Reid shine lokacin da ya rage gudu zuwa 160km / h.

translation.en: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
translation.ha: A cikin watanni 3 da suka gabata, fiye da mutane 80 a ka saki daga babban wajen tsare mutane ba tare da an gurfanar da su gaban kotu ba.

translation.en: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
translation.ha: A cikin watan Afrilun bana, Alkali Glynn ya ba da dokan hana fita akan yunkurin tilasta sakin wadanda aka tsare fiye da awanni 24 bayan kwamishinan kotu bai saurari tuhumar su ba kafi a tsare su.

translation.en: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
translation.ha: Kwamishinan ya bayar da beli, idan an yarda, sai jami’in da ya yi kamun ya shigar da tuhumar. Sannan sai a saka cajin tuhumar cikin kwamfutar jihar yadda za’a iya bin shari’ar.

translation.en: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
translation.ha: Sauraren karar ya tabbatar da ranar da hakkin wanda ake zargi, na samun shari’a cikin gaggawa.

translation.en: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
translation.ha: Peter Costello, ma'ajin Australia kuma mutumin da ake ganin zai gaji Minista John Howard a matsayin shugaban jam'iyyar 'yantattu ya bada goyan bayan sa ga masana'antar nukiliya a Australia.

translation.en: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
translation.ha: Mista Costello ya ce lokacin da karfin nukiliya ta zama mai amfani da tattalin arziki, ya kamata Australia ta ci gaba da amfani da ita.

translation.en: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
translation.ha: “Idan har abin ya zama na kasuwanci, to ya kamata mu same shi. Shi ne kawai babu wata ka’idar nuna rashin amincewa da makamashin nukiliya,” inji Mista Costello.

translation.ha: A cewar Ansa, “yan sanda sun damu saboda wasu manyan matakan bugu wadda suke tsoro na iya tartasa babban yaki na farkewa.

translation.en: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
translation.ha: Yan sanda sun ce Lo Piccolo yana da damar hanun saboda shine na hanun damar Provenzano a Palermo kuma mafi girman kwarewanshi ya ba shi girman a tsakanin manyan tsohon zamani yadda suka fuskanci dokar Provenzo na ajiyar boye tare da karfafa yanar zumuncin su.

translation.ha: Provenzano ne ya kayyade wadannan shuwagabannin a lokacin da ya kawo karshen yakin da Riina ke yi da jihar da ta yi sababin rayukan maharan Mafia Giovanni Falcone da Paolo Borsellino a shekarar 1992.”

translation.en: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
translation.ha: Shugaban Kamfanin Apple Steve Jobs ya kaddamar da na'urar ta hanyar takawa zuwa kan dandamalin sannan fitar da iPhone din daga aljihun wandonsa na jeans.

translation.en: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
translation.ha: A jawabinsa na sa’o’i 2 ya bayyana cewa “Yau kamfanin Apple zai sake buga wayar, za mu kafa tarihi a yau”.

translation.en: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
translation.ha: Brazil ita ce babbar cibiyar Roman Katolika a Duniya, kuma Cocin Roman Katolika na cigaba da adawa da halatta auren jinsi a kasar.

translation.en: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
translation.ha: Babban Taron Ƙasa na Brazil ya yi shekaru goma ya na muhawarar yin dokar, kuma irin wannan aure an halasta shi ne kawai a jihar Rio Grande.

translation.en: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
translation.ha: Tsohon magajin garin São Paulo, Marta Suplicy ce ta kirkiri dokar ta asali. Ƙudurin dokar da aka gabatar, bayan an yi masa gyara, yanzu yana hannun Roberto Jefferson.

translation.en: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
translation.ha: Masu zanga-zangar suna zaton samun takaddama mai dauke da sa hannun mutum miliyan 1.2 domin kaddamarwa a taron majalisar kasa cikin watan Nuwamba.

translation.en: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
translation.ha: Bayan ya bayyana cewa iyalai da dama na neman agajin doka wajen yakin korar, an gudanar da zama na musamman a ranar 20 ga watan Maris a nan Al’umar East Bay Law Center ga wadanda damfarar gidaje ta shafa.

translation.en: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
translation.ha: Lokacin da masu masun haya suka fara musayar abin da ya faru da su, mafi yawan dangin da abin ya shafa sun fahimci cewa Carolyn Wilson na OHA ya saci ajiyarsu ta tsaro, ya tsallake rijiya da baya.

translation.en: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
translation.ha: Masu haya a lambun Lockwood sunyi imanin cewa za'a iya samun wasu iyalai 40 ko fiye da haka da zasu iya fuskantar kora daga gidajensu, tunda sun fahimci cewa 'yan sanda OHA suna binciken wasu kadarorin gidajen jama'ar Oakland wadanda ka iya fadawa cikin zambar harkar gidaje.

translation.en: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
translation.ha: ƙungiyar makaɗa ta soke wasan filin Maui War Memorial, wanda mutane 9,000 za su halarta, kuma sun nemi afuwa ga magoya baya.

translation.en: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
translation.ha: Kamfani mai gudanar da kungiyar makadan, HK Management Inc., bai ba da wani dalili ba da farko lokacin da suka soke a Sa tumba 20, amma sun ɗora laifin a kan rashin kayan aiki washe gari.

translation.en: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
translation.ha: An ɗaure fitattun lauyoyin Girka, Sakis Kechagioglou da George Nikolakopoulos a gidan kason Korydallus na Athens, yayin da aka same su da laifin cin hanci da rashawa.

translation.en: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
translation.ha: A sakamakon wannan, an tayar wani babban abin kunya tsakanin kungiyar lauyoyin Girka ta hanyar fallasa haramtattun ayyuka da alkalai, lauyoyi, yan gudunmowa da manyan alkalai suka aikata a shekarun da suka gabata.

translation.en: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
translation.ha: Bayan 'yan makonnin da suka gabata, bayan bayanan da dan jaridar Makis Triantafylopoulos ya wallafa a cikin sanannen gidan Talabijin dinsa mai suna “Zoungla” a cikin gidan talabijin na Alpha, an cire dan majalisar dokoki kuma lauya, Petros Mantouvalos yayin da mambobin ofishinsa ke da hannu a harkar sata da almubazzaranci. .

translation.en: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
translation.ha: Haka kuma, babban alkalin Evangelos Kalousis yana kurkuku saboda an same shi da laifin cin hanci da rashawa da kuma munanan halaye.

translation.en: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
translation.ha: Roberts ya cije akan kin yin magana game da lokacin da ya yi imanin cewa rayuwa ta fara, wata muhimmiyar tambaya idan ana la’akari da dacewar zubar da ciki, yana mai cewa ba zai dace a faɗi maganganu game da takamaiman lamurra masu kama ba.

translation.en: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
translation.ha: Don haka, ya sake nanata abinda ya fada a baya cewa Roe v. Wade ya kasance “doka karbabbiya ar ƙasa”, tare da jaddada mahimmancin rashin kwan gaba kwan baya a hukunce-hukunce kolin koli.

translation.en: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
translation.ha: Ya kuma tabbatar da cewa ya yarda da manufar da ke bada damar samun sirri wadda hukuncin Roe ya dogara a kai.

translation.en: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
translation.ha: Maroochydore ya gama a saman tsanin, tare da makuna shida a gaban Noose da ya zo na biyu.

translation.ha: Ɓangarorin biyu za su haɗu a babban wasan kusa da na ƙarshe inda Noosa suka ƙare da yin nasara da maki 11.

translation.en: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
translation.ha: Daga nan Maroochydore ya doke Caboolture a Wasan Share Fagen na Ƙarshe.

translation.en: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .

translation.en: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million.
translation.ha: Yesu mai shekaru 21 ya shiga kungiyar Manchester City shekaran da ta gabata a watan Janairu shekara 2017 daga kugiyar Palmeiras na Brazil a kudi £27.

translation.en: Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
translation.ha: Tun daga wannan lokacin, dan kasar Brazil din ya buga wasanni 53 a kungiyar a duk gasa kuma ya zira kwallaye 24.

translation.en: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.
translation.ha: Dr. Lee ya nuna damuwarsa akan rahotanni cewa yanzu yara a ƙasar Turkiya sun kamu da cutar murar A(H5N1) ba tare da sun yi rashin lafiya ba.

translation.en: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.
translation.ha: Sakamakon wasu bincike sun nuna cewa dole tasirin cutar ya ragu kafin ta iya haifar da annoba a duniya, in ji shi.

translation.en: There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
translation.ha: Akwai korafi cewa majinyatan zasu iya cigaba da yada cutar a kan mutane da dama ta hanyar alamuransu na yau da kullum idan har alamun ciwon bai bayana ba.

translation.en: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation.
translation.ha: Leslie Aun, mai magana da yawun Gidauniyar Komen, ya ce hukumar ta amince da wata sabuwar doka wadda ta hana bayar da tallafi ko gudunmuwar kuɗi ga ƙungiyoyin da ake wa bunciken shari’a.

translation.en: Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.
translation.ha: Manufar Komen ta hana Iyayen Tsararru sanadiyyar binciken kashe kudi kan yadda Tsararren Iyaye yake ciyarwa kuma ta ba da rahoton kuɗaɗɗinta wanda Wakilin Cliff Stearns ke gudanarwa.

translation.en: Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
translation.ha: Stearns yana binciken ko an yi amfani da haraji don biyan kuɗin zubar da ciki ta hanyar ƙungiyar planned Parenthood a matsayinsa na shugaban Ƙaramin Kwamiti na Sa-ido da Bincike, wanda ke karkashin lamuran Kwamitin Makamashi da Kasuwanci na Majalisar.

translation.en: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.
translation.ha: Tsohon gwamnan Massachusetts Mitt Romney ya lashe zaɓen fitar da gwani na ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa na Jam’iyyar Republican a ranar Talata da kashi 46 na kuri’un.

translation.en: Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent.
translation.ha: Tsohon Kakakin Majalisar Wakilai ta Amurka Newt Gingrich ya zo na biyu da kashi 32.

translation.en: As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
translation.ha: A matsayin jihar da mai nasara ke kwashe komai, Florida ta miƙa dukkan wakilanta hamsin ga Romney, inda hakan ya tura shi sama a matsayin wanda yake kan gaba a zaben fidda gwani na Jam’iyyar Republican.

translation.en: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover.
translation.ha: Masu shirya zanga-zangar sun ce kusan mutane 100,000 ne suka fito a biranen Jamus kamar su Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, da Hanover.

translation.en: In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors.
translation.ha: A Berlin, yan sanda sun kimanta masu zanga-zanga guda 6,500.

translation.en: Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland.
translation.ha: An kaddamar da zanga-zanga a garin Paris, da garin Sofia na Bulgaria, da garin Vilinius a Lithuania, da Valetta a Malta, Tallinn a Estonia, da kuma garin Edinburgh da garin Glasgow a Scotland.

translation.en: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices.
translation.ha: Kimanin mutane 200 ne suka yi zanga-zanga a kofar inda manyan ofisoshin wasu masu haƙƙin mallaka su ke.

translation.en: Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now.
translation.ha: Watan da ya gabata, akwai manya-manya zanga-zanga a Poland yayin da kasar ta sa hannu a ACTA, wanda ya haifar da gwamnatin Poland yanke shawarar kin amincewa da yarjejeniyar, a halin yanzu.

translation.en: Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
translation.ha: Latvia da Slovakia duk sun jinkirtar da aiwatar haɗin kai da ACTA.

translation.en: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs.
translation.ha: Kungiyoin kare hakkin dabbobi da kungiyar yanta dabbobi da kuma kungiyar hana yi wa dabbobi ukuba, na kiran cewa lallai ne a saka na’urar daukan hoto mai motsi, a dukkan mayankar da ke kasar Australiya.

translation.en: RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia.
translation.ha: Sabon babban jami’in RSPCA na Wales ta Kudu David O'Shannessy ya shaidawa ABC cewa ya kamata a sa-ido da kuma duba mayanka ya kasance aikin yau da kullum a Australia.

translation.en: "The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."
translation.ha: “Na’urar daukar hoton zai ja hankali ga wadanda ke aiki da dabbobi wajen tabbatar da cewa kiwon dabbobin shine mafi muhimmaci.”

translation.en: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior.
translation.ha: Taswirar binciken yanayin girgizar kasa ta duniya na Amurka ta nuna babu girgizar kasa a Iceland a satin da ya gabata.

translation.en: The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours.
translation.ha: Ofishin kula da yanayi na Icelandic shima ya ba da rahoton cewa babu wata girgizar kasa a yankin Hekla a cikin awanni 48 da suka gabata.

translation.en: The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera.
translation.ha: Muhimmin abinda girgizar kasar ta yi shine kawo canji a ranar 10 ga watan Maris a daidai arewa maso gabashin dutse mai aman wuta na Caldera.

translation.en: Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain.
translation.ha: An sanar da bakin hadari mara alaka da al’amari na amon dutse a gindin dutsen.

translation.en: The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.
translation.ha: Gizagizai sun gabatar da yiwuwar rikicewa game da shin ainihin fashewar dutsen ta auku.

translation.en: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater.
translation.ha: Jirgin Luno na da man da ya kai cubic mita 120-160 a cikinsa a lokacin da ya lalace kuma iska da igiyoyin ruwa masu ƙarfi suka tura shi kan shingen ruwa.

translation.en: Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose.
translation.ha: Jirage masu saukar ungulu sun ceci ma'aikata goma sha biyu babu wani rauni sai dai karyewar hanci.

translation.en: The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.
translation.ha: Jirgin ruwan mai girman mita-100 yana kan hanyar zuwa ɗaukar kayan takin zamani da ya saba kuma da farko jami’ai sun yi fargabar jirgin ruwan zai zubar da kaya.

translation.en: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011.
translation.ha: Canjin da aka gabatar ya riga ya wuce duka gidaje a cikin 2011.

translation.en: A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday.
translation.ha: An yi wani canji a wannan zaman majalisar lokacin da aka share jumla ta biyu da farko a Majalisar Wakilai sannan daga nan sai Majalisar Dattijai ma ta amince da ita a irin wannan tsarin.

translation.en: The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future.
translation.ha: Kasawar jimla ta biyun, wadda ta kawo shawarar haramta ƙungiyoyin jama’a na jinsi guda, zai iya bude kofa ga ƙungiyoyin jama’a nan gaba.

translation.en: Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.
translation.ha: Idan aka la’akari da matakan, za’ a kara yin dubiya ga HJR-3 a zababben majalisar na gaba cikin 2015 ko 2016 domin cigaba da matakin.

translation.en: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship.
translation.ha: Nasarorin da Vautier ta samu marasa alaka da bada umarni ba sun hada da yajin cin abinci a 1973 a kan abin da ya ke ganin dabaibayin siyasa ne.

translation.en: French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II.
translation.ha: An canza dokar Faransa. Jajircewar sa ta samo asali tun a baya yana da shekaru 15 lokacin da ya shiga rundunar sa-kai ta Faransa yayin yakin duniya na ll.

translation.en: He documented himself in a 1998 book.
translation.ha: Ya rubuta labarin kansa a cikin wani littafin 1998.

translation.en: In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.
translation.ha: A shekarun 1960 ya kama hanyar komawa zuwa Algeria da ta sami ‘yancin kai don koyar da aikin bada umarni a fim.

translation.en: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54.
translation.ha: Judoka Hitoshi Saito ɗan ƙasar Japan, wanda ya ci lambobin zinare biyu na Olamfik, ya rasu da shekaru 54.

translation.en: The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer.
translation.ha: An ba da sanarwar sanadin mutuwar shine ciwon daji na ƙwayar cuta ta ciki.

translation.en: He died in Osaka on Tuesday.
translation.ha: Ya rasu a Osaka a ranar Talata.

translation.en: As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
translation.ha: Baya ga kasancewa tsohon zakaran gasar Olamfik da ta Duniya, a lokacin mutuwarsa Salto na rike da mukamin shugaban kwamitin horas da ‘yan wasa na Tarayyar Ƙungiyoyin Judo na kasar Japan.

translation.en: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year.
translation.ha: Aƙalla mutane 100 ne suka halarci walimar, don murnar cikar shekara guda ta ma’auratan da aka ɗaura wa aure shekarar da ta gabata.

translation.en: A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said.
translation.ha: An shirya taron bikin kewayon shekara zuwa wani lokaci na gaba, jami'an sun ce.

translation.en: The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives.
translation.ha: Ma'auratan sun yi aure a Texas shekara guda da ta gabata kuma sun zo Buffalo don yin biki tare da abokai da dangi.

translation.en: The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
translation.ha: Mijin mai shekaru 30, wanda haifaffen garin Buffalo, yana daya daga cikin mutane hudun da aka kashe a harbin, amma bai yi wa matarsa rauni ba.

translation.en: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career.
translation.ha: Karno sanannen malamin turanci ne amma mai jayayya wadda ya koyar a karkashin Modern Education da King’s Glory wadda yake ikirarin ya yi dalibai dubu tara (9,000) a ganiyar aikinsa na koyarwa.

translation.en: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class.
translation.ha: A cikin rubutunsa ya yi amfani da kalmomi waɗanda wasu iyayen suke ganin ba su dace ba, kuma an ruwaito cewa ya yi amfani da batsa a cikin aji.

translation.en: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor.
translation.ha: Ilimin Zamani ya zarge shi da buga manyan tallace-tallace a jikin motocin bas ba tare da izini ba da kuma yin karyar cewa shi ne babban malamin Turanci.

translation.en: He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged.
translation.ha: An kuma zarge shi a baya da keta haƙƙin mallaka, amma ba a tuhume shi ba.

translation.en: A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'
translation.ha: Wani tsohon dalibi ya fada cewa ya ‘yi amfani da wani harshe na dabam, ya koyar da dabarun soyayya a rubuce, sannan yana kamar abokin daliban.’

translation.en: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy.
translation.ha: A cikin shekaru talatin da suka gabata, duk da kasancewarta a matsayin kwaminisanci a hukumance, China ta bunkasa tattalin arzikin kasuwa.

translation.en: The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.
translation.ha: Sauye-sauyen tattalin arziki na farko ta gudana ne a ƙarƙashin jagorancin Deng Xiaoping.

translation.en: Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times.
translation.ha: Tun lokacin, tattalin arzikin China ya karu har sau 90.

translation.en: For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry.
translation.ha: A karo na farko, shekarar da ta gabata kasar China ta fitar da mafi yawan motoci fiye da Jamus kuma ta zarce America a matsayin mafi girman kasuwa a wanan masana’anta.

translation.en: China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
translation.ha: GDP ɗin China zai iya girma fiye da Amurka cikin shekaru ashirin.

translation.en: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean.
translation.ha: Guguwar Daniell na kasashe masun zafi, na hudu an kira sunan guguwar shine Atlantic 2010 hurricane, wanda ya kafu a gabashin tekun atlantic.

translation.en: The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph).
translation.ha: Guguwar, da ke da nisan kimanin mil 3,000 daga Miami ta Florida, na tare da iska da ke gudun mil 40 a awa guda (64 kph).

translation.en: Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday.
translation.ha: Masana kimiyya a Cibiyar Guguwa ta Kasa sun yi hasashen cewa Danielle za ta yi ƙarfi ta zama guguwa zuwa Laraba.

translation.en: As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
translation.ha: Tun da akwai sauran lokaci kafin guguwar ta isa doron ƙasa, abu ne mawuyaci a iya tantance irin tasirin da za ta haifar ga Amurka ko yankin Caribbean.

translation.en: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade.
translation.ha: Haifafen birnin tarayyan Croatia, Zagreb, Bobek ya samu shahara yayinda yake yi wa Partizan Belgrade wasa.

translation.en: He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958.
translation.ha: Ya hadu da su a cikin 1945 kuma ya kasance har zuwa 1958.

translation.en: During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances.
translation.ha: A zaman shi da kungiyar, ya sha kwallaye 403 a bayyanuwa 468.

translation.en: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek.
translation.ha: Babu wanda ya fi Bobek yawan wasannin da ya buga ko zura kwallaye mafi yawa.

translation.en: In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.
translation.ha: A 1995 an zabe shi dan wasa mafi kyau a tarihin Partizan.

translation.en: The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil.
translation.ha: Bikin ya fara da nuni na musamman daga mashahuriyar kungiyar nan ta duniya Cirque du Soleil.

translation.en: It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.
translation.ha: Ya cigaba da kungiyar waka ta Istanbul wato Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra a Janissary, daga cikin dakarun masarauta, da mawakan kungiyar Fatih Erkoç da Müslüm Gürses.

translation.en: Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage.
translation.ha: Daga nan Muridai Masu Juyi suka shiga fagen.

translation.en: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou.
translation.ha: Shahararriyar mawaƙiyar Turkiyya Sezen Aksu ta yi waƙa tare da mawaƙin tenor ɗan ƙasar Italiya Alessandro Safina da kuma mawakin Girka Haris Alexiou.

translation.en: To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show "Troy".
translation.ha: Domin kammala shirin, kungiyar rawa daga Turkiya wato Fire of Anatolia sun yi wasan su na shirin “Troy”.

translation.en: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
translation.ha: Peter Lenz, wani ɗan tseren babur mai shekaru 13, ya mutu bayan da ya samu hatsari a Titin Tseren Mota na Indianapolis.

translation.en: While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat.
translation.ha: Yayin da ya ke zagayen motsa jiki, Lenz ya faɗo daga kan kekensa, inda abokin tserensa Xavier Zayat ya buge shi.

translation.en: He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died.
translation.ha: Nan da nan likitocin asibitin suka tarbe shi tare da ma’aikacin asibiti mara bi sawu kuma an kai shi wani asibitin gida inda daga baya ya mutu.

translation.en: Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
translation.ha: Zayat bai sami rauni ba a cikin haɗarin.

translation.en: Regarding the global financial situation, Zapatero continued by saying that "the financial system is a part of the economy, a crucial part.
translation.ha: Game da yanayin hada-hadar kudi a duniya, Zapatero ya ci gaba da cewa “tsarin kudi wani bangare ne na tattalin arziki, kuma mai matukar muhimmanci.

translation.en: We have a year-long financial crisis, which has had its most acute moment in the past two months, and I think now the financial markets are beginning to recover."
translation.ha: Mun sami rigicin rashin kuɗi na tsawon shekara guda, wanda ya tsananta matuka a cikin watanni biyu da suka gabata, kuma ina tsammanin yanzu kasuwannin sha’anin kuɗi sun fara murmurewa.”

translation.en: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts.
translation.ha: A makon da ya gabata, Naked News ya ba da sanarwar cewa za ta kara karfin ikon harshenta a duniya zuwa rahoton labarai, tare da sabbin labarai uku.

translation.en: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
translation.ha: Dama tana rahoto a Ingilishi da harshen Japan, ƙungiyar ta duniya za ta ƙaddamar da shirye-shiryen harsunan Spanish, Italiyanci, da na Koriya, don talabijin, yanar-gizo, da kuma na'urorin tafi-da-gidanka.

translation.en: "Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out.
translation.ha: “Cikin sa’a babu abun da ya faru da ni, amma na ga abun tashin hankali, yayin da mutane suke ƙaƙarin fasa tagogi domin su fita.

translation.en: People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable.
translation.ha: Mutane na buga ƙyauren tagogin da kujeru, amma tagogin ba masu fashewa ba ne.

translation.en: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin wadanda su ka tsira Franciszek Kowal ya ce “Da muka samu murfin tagar ya karye, sai muka fara fita ta tagar”.

translation.en: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements.
translation.ha: Taurari suna fitar da wuta da zafi saboda karfin da aka samo yayin da aka hada sinadarin Hydrogen da kwayoyin zarra (ko aka hada) tare domin haifar abubuwa masu nauyi.

translation.en: Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way.
translation.ha: Masana kimiyya suna aiki don ƙirƙirar wata na’ura da za ta sarrafa makamashi ta irin wannan hanya.

translation.en: This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
translation.ha: Wannan, duk da haka, matsala ce mai matuƙar wahalar warwarewa kuma zai ɗauki shekaru da yawa kafin mu ga an gina na’urori haɗaka masu amfani.

translation.en: The steel needle floats on top of the water because of surface tension.
translation.ha: Allurar ƙarfen tana yawo a saman ruwa saboda kaurin saman ruwa.

translation.en: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them.
translation.ha: Kumburin ruwa na faruwa ne saboda kananan kwayoyin cikin ruwa a farfajiyan ruwan suna matuƙar jhaɗuwa da juna saɓanin yadda suke kankananan kwayoyi na iska a da ke samansu.

translation.en: The water molecules make an invisible skin on the water’s surface that allows things like the needle to float on top of the water.
translation.ha: Kwayoyin halittar ruwan suna yin wata fata da ba a gani a saman ruwa wadde ke ba da dama ga abubuwa kamar allura su riƙa yawo a saman ruwa.

translation.en: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted.
translation.ha: Karfe da ke kan takalman zamani na wasa a kankara na da baki biyu da buɗaɗɗen rami tsakanin su. Gefen biyun suna ba da izini don kyakkyawan kamu kankaran, koda kuwa an goge shi.

translation.en: Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves.
translation.ha: Saboda wukar ta dan lankwashe daga kasanta, yayinda wajen kaifin ya karkace dag nan zuwa can, tsinin wanda ya taba kankarar shi ma ya dan lankwashe.

translation.en: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
translation.ha: Wannan yana sa skater ya juya. Idan skates suka yi hagu zuwa dama, skater din tayi dama, idan skates dinsu yi hagu zuwa hagu, skater din sai ya juya hagu.

translation.en: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light.
translation.ha: Don komowa kan matakin makamashinsu irin na baya, dole sai sun kawar da ƙarin makamashin da suka samu daga haske.

translation.en: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".
translation.ha: Suna yin wannan ta hanyar sakin wani ɗan ƙaramin hasken wuta da ake kira “photon”.

translation.en: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation.
translation.ha: Masana kimiyya suna kiran wannan tsarin “rurar watsin haskaka” domin ana rura ƙwayar zarra ta hanyar wuta mai haske, wanda ke sa watsin hasken foton, da haske wata iri haskakawa ne.

translation.en: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
translation.ha: Hoto na gaba yana nuna kwayan zarra masu fitar da photons. Hakika, a zahiri photons sunfi yawa akan waɗanda suke cikin hoton.

translation.en: Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!
translation.ha: Photons suna da kankanci fiye da abin da ke kunshe cikin atom!

translation.en: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.
translation.ha: Bayan aiki na ɗaruruwan sa’o’i a ƙarshe sai zaren haske da ke cikin ƙwan fitilar ya ƙone daga nan ƙwan fitilar ya daina aiki.

translation.en: The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb.
translation.ha: Kwan fitilan lantarkin na bukatan canzawa. Yana da muhimmanci ayi la’akari wurin canza kwan fitilan.

translation.en: First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected.
translation.ha: Farko, ya kamata a kashe matatsar wutan ko kuma katse hadin wayan kebur din.

translation.en: This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
translation.ha: Wannan saboda wutan lantarki da ke shigan socket a inda karfe na jikin kwan fitila ke zaune na iya baka rawar jiki mai tsanani idan ka taba cikin socket ko karfe na kwan fitilan yayinda yake hade da socket.

translation.en: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood.
translation.ha: Babban mahimmin tsarin magudanar jini shine zuciya, wacce ke harba jini.

translation.en: Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.
translation.ha: Jini na fitowa daga zuciya ta hanyoyin da ake kira arteries sannan ya na komawa cikin zuciya ta hanyoyin da ake kira veins. Mafikan kantar wadannan hanyoyi su ake kira da capillaries.

translation.en: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots.
translation.ha: Hakoran triceratops za su iya taune ba kawai ganye ba har ma da tsauraran rassa da saiwoyi.

translation.en: Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous.
translation.ha: Wasu masana kimiyya suna tunanin Triceratops ne ya ci Cycads, wanda nau'in tsirrai ne wanda aka saba da shi a cikin Cretaceous.

translation.en: These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves.
translation.ha: Wadannan tsirrai suna kama da kananan bishiyar kwakwa da rawanin kaifi, ganyaye masu suka.

translation.en: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk.
translation.ha: Triceratops na amfani da bakin sa mai karfi don cire ganyen kafin cin bawon.

translation.en: Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.
translation.ha: Wasu masana kimiyyar sun kawo hujjar cewa waɗannan tsirrai suna ɗauke da guba don haka zai yi wuya a ce kakannin ƙadangare na cin su, koda yake yanzu sloth da sauran dabbobi kamar aku (jikokin kakannin ƙadangare) su kan ci ganyaye ko yayan itace masu guba.

translation.en: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth.
translation.ha: Ta yaya ne nauyin lo zai ja ni? Idan ku ka tsaya a farfajiyan Io, nauyin ku ba zai kai nauyin ku na kan duniyarmu ba.

translation.en: A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.
translation.ha: Mutum mai nauyin fam 200 (90kg) a duniya zai yi kimanin fam 36 (16kg) a kan Io. Don haka nauyi, ba shakka, yana jan ƙasa akan ku.

translation.en: The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma.
translation.ha: Rana ba ta da abi haskakawa kamar Duniyar wanda za ka tsaye a kai. Duka ranar ya keru ne dan nauyin gas, wuta, da kuma sinadarin plasma.

translation.en: The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun.
translation.ha: Iskar gas in yana zama siriri yayin da kake kara nisa daga tsakiyar rana.

translation.en: The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light".
translation.ha: Bangaren da muke gani idan muka kalli Rana ana kiran sa photosphere, wanda yake nufin “kwallon haske”.

translation.en: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does.
translation.ha: Kimanin shekaru dubu uku bayan haka, a cikin 1610, masanin Falaki ɗan ƙasar Italiya Galileo Galilei ya yi amfani da na’urar hangen nesa don lura cewa Venus tana da matakai, kamar yadda wata yake yi.

translation.en: Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun.
translation.ha: Hanyoyi suna faruwa saboda kawai gefen Venus (ko na Wata) da ke fuskantar Rana yana haske. Matakan Venus sun goyi bayan ka'idar Copernicus cewa duniyoyin suna zagaya Rana.

translation.en: Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
translation.ha: Sai kuma a sheakaru kalilian bayan haka a shekarar 1639, wani masanin ililmin taurari dan kasar Ingila mai suna Jeremiah Horrocks ya gano motsin tauraron Venus.

translation.en: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw.
translation.ha: England ta fuskanci doguwar lokacin salama bayan ta sake karbe iko daga Danelaw.

translation.en: However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier.
translation.ha: Duk da haka a 991 Ethelred ta fuskanci anobar jirgi mai saukar ungulu wace ta fi kowace girma tun karnin Guthrum baya.

translation.en: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination.
translation.ha: Wannan kwambar jiragen ruwan yaƙi ta kasance karkashin jagorancin Olaf Trygvasson, dan kasar Norway da ke da burin ƙwato kasarsa daga danniyar kasar Denmark.

translation.en: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
translation.ha: Bayan koma bayan soja da aka samu da farko, Ethelred ya sami daidaituwa da Olaf, wanda ya koma Norway domin kokarin kwato masarautar sa, wadda ya sami nasara a wani wajen amma a wani wajen bai samu ba.

translation.en: Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450).
translation.ha: Hangeul shine kadai huruffi wadda aka kirkira kuma ake amfani da shi kullum. An kirkiro haruffin ne a 1444 a zamanin mulkin Sarki Sejong (1418 - 1450).

translation.en: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.
translation.ha: Sarki Sajong shi ne sarki na huɗu a Daular Joseon kuma ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda aka fi ji da su.

translation.en: He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "the correct sounds for the instruction of the people".
translation.ha: Asali ya sakawa haruffan Hangeul sunan Hunmin Jeongeum, wanda ke nufin “haruffa da su ka dace wajen koyar da mutane.

translation.en: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them.
translation.ha: Akwai hasashe da yawa kan yadda aka sami harshen Sanskrit. Ɗaya daga cikinsu shine game da hijirar jinsin Aryaniyawa daga yamma zuwa India waɗanda suka zo da yarensu.

translation.en: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe.
translation.ha: Sanskrit tsohon harshe ne wanda za a iya kwatantawa da harshen Latin da ake magana da shi a Turai.

translation.en: The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy.
translation.ha: Littafin farko da aka sani a duniya an rubuta shi da Sanskrit. Bayan an haɗa Upanishads, sai Sanskrit ya ɓace saboda matsayi.

translation.en: Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
translation.ha: Sanskrit yare ne mai fadi da kuma mai wadatar gaske, wanda ya zama tushen harsunan Indiya da yawa na zamani, kamar dai Latin shine tushen harsunan Turai kamar Faransanci da yaran spanish.

translation.en: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain.
translation.ha: Tare da yakin Faransa, Jamus ta fara shirin mamaye tsibirin Biritaniya.

translation.en: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak.
translation.ha: Lambar-sirri ta Jamus ta sanya wa harin suna “Operation Sealion”. Yawancin manyan makamai da kayan sojojin Burtaniya sun ɓace lokacin da aka kwashe su daga Dunkirk, don haka sojojin ba su da ƙarfi.

translation.en: But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel.
translation.ha: Amma Rundunar Sojojin ruwa na Sarauta na da ƙarfi sosai fiye da rundunar sojojin ruwan Jamus (“Kriegsmarine”) kuma da ya salwantar da duk wani mamayewar jirgin ruwan da aka aika ƙetaren hanyar ruwan Ingila.

translation.en: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
translation.ha: Kodayake, jiragen ruwan Birtaniya kalilan ne su ke kusa da hanyoyin da ake tsammanin za’a kawo farmaki saboda shugabannin sojan na tsoron sojojin Jamus na iya nutsar da su.

translation.en: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan.
translation.ha: Bari mu fara da bayani game da shirye-shiryen Italiya. Italiya ta kasance “kanin” na Jamus da Japan.

translation.en: It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war.
translation.ha: Tana da rundunar sojan ƙasa da na ruwa marasa ƙarfi, duk da cewa sun kera sabbin jiragen ruwa guda hudu kafin barkewar yakin.

translation.en: Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa.
translation.ha: Babban burin Italiya shine kasashen Afirka. Domin mamayar waɗannan ƙasashen, suna buƙatar samun wajen tara sojoji ta yadda rundunoninsu zasu iya ratsa tekun Bahr Rum su mamaye Afirka.

translation.en: For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else.
translation.ha: Don hakan, dole ne su kawar da sansanoni da jiragen ruwan Birtaniya a Masar. Bayan waɗancan ayyukan, ba a tsammanin jiragen ruwan yaƙi na Italiya su yi wani abu kuma.

translation.en: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.
translation.ha: Yanzu ga Japan. Japan ƙasa ce tsibiri, kamar Biritaniya.

translation.en: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time.
translation.ha: An tsara Jiragen ƙarkashin ruwa jiragen ruwa domin yin tafiya a ƙarkashin ruwa, kuma su kasance a can na wani dogon lokaci.

translation.en: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range.
translation.ha: An yi amfani da jiragen yaƙi masu tafiya a ƙarƙashin ruwa a Yaƙin Duniya na I da Yaƙin Duniya na II. A can baya ba su da sauri kuma ba su iya harbi mai nisa.

translation.en: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.
translation.ha: A farkon yakin galibi suna tafiya akan saman teku, amma yayin da kimiyyar radar ta kara haɓaka, kwarancewa ta samu soasai yadda jiragen karkashin teku basu da zabi dole sai sun yi nutso yadda ba za’a iya ganin su ba.

translation.en: German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines.
translation.ha: Ana kiran jiragen ruwa masu nutso na kasar Jamus da sunan U-Boats. Jamusawa sun iya tukawa da sarrafa wadannan jirage nasu.

translation.en: Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
translation.ha: Saboda nasarar da suke samu da jirage masu tafiya a ƙarƙashin ruwa, bayan yakin ba a yarda Jamusawa suna da su da yawa ba.

translation.en: Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as "King Tut" or "The Boy King", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times.
translation.ha: Haka ne! Sarki Tutankhamun, wani lokaci ana kiransa “Sarki Tut” ko “Yaron Sarki”, ɗayan sanannun sarakunan Masar ne a zamanin yau.

translation.en: Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists.
translation.ha: Abin sha'awa, ba a ɗauke shi da muhimmanci sosai a zamanin da ba kuma ba a rubuce shi a cikin jerin sunayen tsoffin sarakuna ba.

translation.en: However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed.
translation.ha: Ko da yake, ganowar kabarin sa a 1922 ya maida shi shahararre. Yayin da kaburbura na baya suka fuskanci barazanan sata, an bar kabarin sa ba tare da hargitse shi ba.

translation.en: Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones.
translation.ha: Mafi yawan abubuwan da aka binne Tutankhamun da su basu rube ko lalace ba, ciki har da dubban kayan kawa wadanda aka samar daga duwatsu masu daraja da wadansu duwatsu da babu irinsu.

translation.en: The invention of spoke wheels made Assyrian chariots lighter, faster, and better prepared to outrun soldiers and other chariots.
translation.ha: Kegawar sandar linzamin ya sa kurasain Assiriyawa ya zama da rashin nauyi, sauri da kuma sun shirya da kyau domin su fi sojoji gudu da wasu kurasain.

translation.en: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry.
translation.ha: Kibiyoyinsu masu hadari da ake harbawa na iya fasa kariyar sojojin abokan gaba. Wajajen shekaru 1000 B.C.kafin zuwan annabi Musa yan Asiriya su ka kirkiri sojojin dawaki.

translation.en: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. The saddle had not yet been invented, so the Assyrian cavalry fought on the bare backs of their horses.
translation.ha: Sojan dawakai su ne rundunar sojan da ke yaƙi kan dawakai. Ba a ƙirƙiro sirdi a lokacin ba, don haka sojan dawakai na Assiriyawa sun yi yaƙi a kan tsuran bayan dawakan su.

translation.en: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey.
translation.ha: Mun san ‘yan siyasa. masana kimiyya da kuma masu nishaɗantarwa na Girka da dama. Mai yiwuwa mafi shaharar mutum a wannan al’ada shi ne Homer, fitaccen mawakin nan makaho, wanda ya rubuta fitattun ayyukan adabin Greek biyu: waƙoƙin Iliad da Odyssey.

translation.en: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature.
translation.ha: Sophocles da Aristophanes har yanzu shahararrun marubutan wasan kwaikwayo ne kuma ana ganin wasannin su suna daga cikin manyan ayyukan adabin duniya.

translation.en: Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
translation.ha: Wani sanannen Bagirke mai ilimin lissafin Pythagoras, an san shi da fitacen dabara mai zurfin sa dangane ga dangantakar kusuryoyin alwatikar.

translation.en: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world.
translation.ha: Akwai mabambantan kiyasi na yawan mutanen da ke jin harshen Hindi. An ƙiyasta cewa yana tsakanin harshe na biyu zuwa na hudu cikin yarukan da aka fi amfani da su a duniya.

translation.en: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted.
translation.ha: Adadin masu magana da yaren ya bambanta dangane da ko an ƙidaya yaruka masu alaƙa da juna.

translation.en: Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language.
translation.ha: Kimantawa ta masu magana ta kama daga miliyan 340 zuwa miliyan 500, kuma kusan mutane miliyan 800 ne ke iya fahimtar yaren.

translation.en: Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
translation.ha: Hindi da Urdu sun yi kama a kalmomi amma daban a rubutu; a tattaunawar yau da kullun, masu magana da harsunan biyu na iya fahimtar junan su.

translation.en: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany.
translation.ha: A wajejen ƙarni na 15, arewacin Estonia yana ƙarƙashin tasirin al’adu na ƙasar Jamus.

translation.en: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language.
translation.ha: Wasu malaman addini na Germany sun so su kawo Allah kusa da mutanen asali, saboda haka suka kirkiro yaren Estonia.

translation.en: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added.
translation.ha: Ta sanadiyar harafin Jamusanci kuma an ƙara harafi ɗaya “Õ / õ”.

translation.en: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment.
translation.ha: Yayin da zamani ya yi nisa, yawancin kalmomin da aka aro daga Jamusanci sun haɗe. Wannan shi ne farko zamanin wayewa.

translation.en: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school.
translation.ha: A al’adance dai, wanda zai gaji sarautar kai tsaye zai tafi ne ga sojoji bayan kammala makaranta.

translation.en: However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree).
translation.ha: Duk da haka, Charles ya halarci jami'ar Trinity College, Cambridge inda ya karanci Ilimin Al’ummomi da Al’adu wato Anthropology and Archaeology da kuma Ilimin Nazarin Kayan Tarihi, kuma daga bisani Tarihi, ya sami digiri na 2:2 (digiri ajin ƙasa na biyu).

translation.en: Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
translation.ha: Charles shi ne memba na farko cikin dangin Sarauta na Burtaniya da aka ba shi digiri.

translation.en: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country.
translation.ha: Turkiyyar Turai (wato gabashin Thrace ko Rumelia da ke cikin sashen tsibirin Balkan) ya kunshi kashi 3% ne na ƙasar.

translation.en: The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape.
translation.ha: Faɗin ƙasar Turkiyya ya kai tsawon kilomita 1,600 (mil 1,000) da kuma faɗin kilomita 800 (mil 500), mai shatin kusurwoyi guda huɗu.

translation.en: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.
translation.ha: Yankin Turkiyya, wanda ya hada da tabkuna, ya mamaye murabba'in murabba'in kilomita 783,562 (300,948 sq mi), wanda murabba'in murabba'in kilomita 755,688 (kilomita 291,773) yana kudu maso yammacin Asiya da kuma murabba'in murabba’in kilomita 23,764 (9,174 sq mi) a Turai.

translation.en: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined.
translation.ha: Faɗin yankin Turkiyya ya sanya ta kasance ƙasa ta 37 mafi girma a duniya, ta kai girman ƙasashen Faransa da Birtaniya a hade.

translation.en: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
translation.ha: Kasar turkiya ta yi iyaka da tekuna guda uku, wato Tekun Aegean a yamma, da Bakin teku a arewa sai kuma na Bahar rum a kudanci.

translation.en: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839.
translation.ha: Luxembourg tana da dogon tarihi amma samin independenceancinta ya samo asali ne daga 1839.

translation.en: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
translation.ha: A yau sassan kasar Belgium, a baya sun kasance ɓangare ne na Luxembourg wadanda a lokacin juyin juya hali na shekarun 1830 su ka komo Belgium.

translation.en: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany.
translation.ha: Luxembourg kodayaushe ta kan yi kokarin kasancewarta ƙasa ‘yar ba-ruwanmu amma Jamus ta mamaye ta a yaƙin Duniya na Ɗaya da Yaƙin Duniya na Biyu.

translation.en: In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1957 Luxembourg ta zama ɗaya daga membobin da suka kafa ƙungiyar da aka sani yanzu da suna European Union.

translation.en: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village).
translation.ha: Drukgyal Dzong tsohon birni ne da ya rushe wanda akwai wajen bautar Buddha da ke sashi mai nisa na gundumar Paro (a ƙauyen Phondey).

translation.en: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces.
translation.ha: An ce a shekarar 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel ya kirkiri sansanin soja don tunawa da nasarar da ya samu a kan sojojin Tibet-Mongol.

translation.en: In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1951, wutar da ta tashi domin zama wata shaidar Drukgyal Dzong ya ci gaba da wanzuwa, kamar hotunan Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.

translation.en: After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
translation.ha: Bayan wutar, an kiyaye sansanin soja da kariya, ya kasance ɗaya da cikin abubuwan jan hankali na Bhutan.

translation.en: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam.
translation.ha: A ƙarni na 18 Cambodia ta sami kanta a matse tsakanin karfafan maƙwabta biyu, Thailand da Vietnam.

translation.en: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen.
translation.ha: Ƴan Thailand sun mamaye Cambodia sau da yawa a ƙarni na 18 inda a shekarar 1772 suka rusa Phnom Phen.

translation.en: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
translation.ha: Shekaru da suka gabata na karni 18 ‘yan Vietnam sun mamaye Cambodia.

translation.en: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy.
translation.ha: Kashi goma sha takwas na ƴan Venezuela ba su da aiki, kuma mafi yawan waɗanda ke da aiki suna aiki ne a kananan masana’antu.

translation.en: Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture.
translation.ha: Kashi biyu bisa uku na mutanen Venezuela na aiki ne a sashen ma’aikatu, daya bisa hudu kuma na aiki a masana’antu,sai kashi daya cikin biyar da ke noma.

translation.en: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
translation.ha: Wata muhimmiyar masana'antu ga 'yan Venezuela ita ce mai, inda ƙasar ta kasance mai fitar da kayayyaki zuwa ƙasashe, kodayake kashi ɗaya cikin ɗari ne ke aiki a masana'antar mai.

translation.en: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City.
translation.ha: A farko farkon samun yanci, kwarewar masana lambu na kasar Singapore sun taimaka wajen maida ta tsibiri mai cike da tsirrai a yanki mai zafin yanayi.

translation.en: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1981, an zaɓi furen Vanda Miss Joaquim, wanda ake samarwa ta barbara a gona, a matsayin furen ƙasa.

translation.en: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains.
translation.ha: Kowace shekara a watan Oktoba kusan dabbobi masu cin ciyawa miliyan 1.5 suke tafiya zuwa tuddan kudu, suna ƙetare Kogin Mara, daga tuddan arewa don ruwan sama.

translation.en: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April.
translation.ha: Daga nan koma arewa ta hanyar yamma, sake tsallake kogin Mara, bayan ruwan sama a wajen watan Afrilu.

translation.en: The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
translation.ha: Yankin Serengeti yana dauke da wajen shakatawa na Serengeti, Yankin Kiyayewa na Ngorongoro da wajen Keɓe Namomin Daji na Maswa a Tanzania da ma wajen namun daji na kasa a Kenya.

translation.en: Learning to create interactive media requires conventional and traditional skills, as well as tools mastered in interactive classes (storyboarding, audio and video editing, story telling, etc.)
translation.ha: Koyo don ƙirƙirar kafofin watsa labarai masu hulɗa yana buƙatar kwarewa na al'ada da na gargajiya, gami da kayan aikin da aka ƙware a cikin azuzuwan hulɗa (hada labarai, gyaran murya da bidiyo, ba da labari, da sauransu)

translation.en: Interactive design requires that you re-assess your assumptions about media production and learn to think in a non-linear ways.
translation.ha: Zayyana ta cuɗanya tana buƙatar da ka sake duba hasashen ka game da shirin kafofin yada labarai sannan ka koyi yin tunani ba ta fuska ɗaya ba.

translation.en: Interactive design requires that components of a project connect to each other, but also make sense as a separate entity.
translation.ha: Cikakkiyar zayyana na buƙatar cewa kowane sashe na hade da juna amma kuma daidaikun abubuwan su kasance da ma’ana idan su na ware.

translation.en: The disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the focal complexity and number of lens elements required to achieve a range of focal lengths is much greater than for prime lenses.
translation.ha: Rashin alfanu na gilasan kusantowa shine cewa wahalar tsayar da gani da kuma yawan kayan gilashin da ake bukata domin cim ma wasu jerin nisan gani ya fi girma akan gilasan ƙayyadajjen gani.

translation.en: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production.
translation.ha: Wannan na kasancewa ba matsala ba saboda masu ƙirar madubin sun cimma wani matsayi babba a wajen ƙera madubi.

translation.en: This has allowed zoom lenses to produce pictures of a quality comparable to that achieved by lenses with fixed focal length.
translation.ha: Wannan ya bai wa tabarau mai kara girma dama wajen samar da ingantattun hotuna fiye da na tabarau mai takaitaccen tsawo.

translation.en: Another disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the maximum aperture (the speed) of the lens is usually lower.
translation.ha: Nakasun gilashin daukan hoto mai kusanto da hoto shine girman fadin kofar da haske ke shiga (saurinta) mai rauni ne.

translation.en: This makes inexpensive zoom lenses hard to use in low-light conditions without a flash.
translation.ha: Wannan yana sanya ruwan tabarau masu hangyen nesa mara tsada mai amfani a cikin yanayin ƙananan haske ba tare da walƙiya ba.

translation.en: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin matsalolin da aka fi sani yayin kokarin juya fim zuwa tsarin DVD shine overscan.

translation.en: Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public.
translation.ha: Yawancin telebijin ana yin su ne ta hanyar da za ta faranta wa jama'a rai.
