translation.en: For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides.
translation.ha: Bisa wannan dalilin, dukkan wani abu da ka gani a Telebijin an yanyanke shi daga ta sama da kasa da kuma gefensa.

translation.en: This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan.
translation.ha: Ana yin wannan don tabbatar da cewa hoton ya rufe dukkan allo. Wannan shi ake kira overscan.

translation.en: Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
translation.ha: Abun takaici, idan kayi DVD, ana iya yanka iyakokin ta, kuma idan bidiyon suna da jerin kalmomin suna kusa da kasa, ba za a nuna su gabaɗaya ba.

translation.en: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry.
translation.ha: Ginin tarihin gargajiyar na ta dade da yin yi wahayi zuwa ga tunanin, tattaro hotunan abubuwan ban sha'awa, bukukuwa da jarumta na Arthurian.

translation.en: Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits.
translation.ha: Ko da a tsaye a cikin shekaru dubu da suka lalace yana da sauƙi mu tuna da sautuna da ƙanshi na fadace-fadace da dadewa, don kusan jin murfin motsi a kan cobbles kuma ku ji tsoron fargabar tashin daga cikin ramin.

translation.en: But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?
translation.ha: Shin tunaninmu kuwa ya dogara a kan zahirin al’amari? Ina dalilin da aka fara gina manyan gudajen sarauta tun asali? ta yaya aka tsara kuma aka gina su?

translation.en: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda ya ke a zamanin, Fadar Kirby Muxloe Castle yafi kama zagayayyen gida maimakon haƙiƙar fada.

translation.en: Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long.
translation.ha: Tagoginsa da ke liƙe da gilashi da siraran katangu ba za su iya jure wani shiryayyen hari na dogon lokaci ba.

translation.en: In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
translation.ha: A cikin 1480s, lokacin da Lord Hastings ya fara ginin, ƙasar ta kasance cikin kwanciyar hankali kuma ana buƙatar kariya ne kawai daga ƙananan ƙungiyoyin masu satar hanya.

translation.en: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states.
translation.ha: Daidaita iko wani tsari ne wanda kasashen Turai suka yi amfani da shi domin tabbatar da ƴancinkan duk ƙasshen yankin Turai.

translation.en: The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance.
translation.ha: Manufar ita ce cewa duk ƙasashen Turai dole ne su nemi hana wata ƙasa ta zama mai ƙarfi, don haka gwamnatocin ƙasashe sau da yawa sukan canza ƙawancensu don kiyaye daidaito.

translation.en: The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power.
translation.ha: Yaƙin Gasar Mutanen Espanya ya nuna farkon yaƙin wanda babban batunsa shine daidaiton iko.

translation.en: This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.
translation.ha: Mai makin abu ne mai mahimmancin canji, ba za su iya zama da karyar zaman yaki na adini ba. Sabo da haka, yakin shekara talatin zai kasance yaki ne na karshe wanda za a kira yakin adini.

translation.en: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus.
translation.ha: An rushe Ɗakin bauta na Artemis a Ephesus a ranar 21 a Yuli, 356 BCE a cinna mashi wuta da Herostratus ya aikata.

translation.en: According to the story, his motivation was fame at any cost. The Ephesians, outraged, announced that Herostratus' name never be recorded.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda labarin ya ce, abin da ya ba shi ƙwarin guiwa shi ne neman suna ta kowane hali. Afisawa, cikin fushi, suka ba da sanarwar cewa ba za a taɓa rubuta sunan Herostratus ba.

translation.en: The Greek historian Strabo later noted the name, which is how we know today. The temple was destroyed on the same night that Alexander the Great was born.
translation.ha: Masanin tarihin Girka Strabo ya lura da sunan daga baya, wanda shine yadda muka sani a yau. An rusa gidan bautar a cikin daren da aka haifi Alexander the Great .

translation.en: Alexander, as king, offered to pay to rebuild the temple, but his offer was denied. Later, after Alexander died, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BCE.
translation.ha: Alexander a matsayin sa na sarki, ya ba da kuɗi don sake gina haikalin, amma ba a karɓi tayin nasa ba. Bayan haka, bayan Alexander ya mutu, aka sake gina haikalin a 323 KZ.

translation.en: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers.
translation.ha: Tabbata cewa hannunku suna a sake yayin da kake bugun kiɗa daidai - kuma yi ƙoƙarin kada kuyi motsin ɗage da yatsunku.

translation.en: This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano.
translation.ha: Ta wannan hanyar, za ku gajiyar da kanku kamar kaɗan daidai gwargwado. Ku tuna cewa babu buƙatar a bugi makullin da ƙarfi sosai don ƙarin murya kamar akan fiyano.

translation.en: On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.
translation.ha: A accordion, domin samun karin yawa, ka yi amfani da mabushi da ƙarfi ko sauri.

translation.en: Mysticism is the pursuit of communion with, identity with, or conscious awareness of an ultimate reality, divinity, spiritual truth, or God.
translation.ha: Sufanci shine bin tarayya da, alaka tare da, ko sane da ainihin gaskiyar, allahntakar, gaskiyar ruhaniya, ko Allah.

translation.en: The believer seeks a direct experience, intuition, or insight into divine reality/the deity or dieties.
translation.ha: Mai imani yana neman wata ƙwarewa, ilhama, ko basira kai tsaye a cikin tabbacin allahntaka/allah ko alloli.

translation.en: Followers pursue certain ways of living, or practices that are intended to nurture those experiences.
translation.ha: Mabiya suna bin wasu hanyoyi na rayuwa, ko ayyukan da aka yi niyyar haɓaka waɗancan abubuwan.

translation.en: Mysticism can be distinguished from other forms of religious belief and worship by its emphasis on the direct personal experience of a unique state of consciousness, particularly those of a peaceful, insightful, blissful, or even ecstatic character.
translation.ha: Za a iya rarrabe ilimin sufanci daga sauran addinai da ibada ta hanyar girmamawa ga kwarewar kai tsaye na wani yanayi na musamman, musamman na zaman lafiya, mai hankali, ni'ima, ko ma mai tsananin farin ciki.

translation.en: Sikhism is a religion from the Indian sub-continent. It originated in the Punjab region during the 15th century from a sectarian split within the Hindu tradition.
translation.ha: Sikhism addini ne daga yankin India. Ya samo asali ne daga yankin Punjab a lokacin karni na 15 daga rarrabuwa tsakanin mazhabobin Hindu.

translation.en: Sikhs consider their faith to be a separate religion from Hinduism though they acknowledge its Hindu roots and traditions.
translation.ha: Mabiya addinin Sikh dai nadaukar kansu a matsayin masu bin wani addini na daban da addinin Hindu duk da cewa ma suna daukar addinin Hindun a zaman tushensu dama al’adarsu.

translation.en: Sikhs call their religion Gurmat, which is Punjabi for "way of the guru". The guru is a fundamental aspect of all Indian religions but in Sikhism has taken on an importance that forms the core of Sikh beliefs.
translation.ha: Mutanen Sikh suna kiran addininsu Gurmat, wanda shine Punjabi don “hanyar Guru”. Guru shine muhimmin bangare na dukkanin addinan Indiya amma a cikin Sikhism ya ɗauki mahimmancin da ke samar da asalin abubuwan Sikh.

translation.en: The religion was founded in the 15th century by Guru Nanak (1469–1539). There followed in succession a further nine gurus.
translation.ha: An kafa adinin a karni na 15 ta Guru Nanak (1469 - 1539). Sannan a ka biyo da waɗanda suka ci gadon sarauta guda tara.

translation.en: However, in June 1956, Krushchev's promises were put to the test when riots in Poland, where workers were protesting against food shortages and wage cuts, turned into a general protest against Communism.
translation.ha: ko da yake, a watan Yuni ta 1956, an gwada alkawuran Krushchev a lokacin da tarzoma a Poland, inda ma'aikata ke zanga-zangar adawa da ƙarancin abinci da rage albashi, ta rikide zuwa zanga-zangar gama gari ta adawa da Kwaminisanci.

translation.en: Although in the end, Krushchev sent in tanks to restore order, he did give way to some economic demands and agreed to appoint the popular Wladyslaw Gomulka as the new prime minister.
translation.ha: Kodayake dai a ƙarshe, Kruschev ya aika da tankokin yaƙi don maido da zaman lafiya, amma ya amince da wasu buƙatun tattalin arziki da kuma naɗa mutumin nan mai farin jini wato Wladyslaw Gomulka a matsayin sabon firayin minista.

translation.en: The Indus Valley Civilization was a Bronze Age civilisation in the northwest Indian subcontinent encompassing most of modern-day Pakistan and some regions in northwest India and northeast Afghanistan.
translation.ha: Wayewar-kai na Kwarin Indus wata wayewar-kai na Zamanin Tagulla ce a arewa maso yamma na ƙaramar nahiyar Indiya wadda ta ƙunshi yawancin ƙasar Pakista na zamanin yau da kuma wasu yankuna a cikin arewa maso yamma na Indiya da kuma arewa maso gabas na ƙasa Afganistan.

translation.en: The civilisation flourished in the basins of the Indus River wherefore it derives its name.
translation.ha: Ci gaban wannan zamani ya bunkasa a kewayen kogin Indus ta inda ya samo sunansa.

translation.en: Although some scholars speculate that since the civilisation also existed in the basins of the now dried up Sarasvati River, it should be aptly called the Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, while some call it the Harappan Civilization after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s.
translation.ha: Koda yake wasu masana suna hasashen cewa tun da ci gaban zamanin ya wanzu a kwarin da kogin Sarasvati ya kafe, ya kamata a kira shi da ci gaban zamani na Indus-Sarasvati, yayin da wasu ke kiransa da ci gaban zamani na Haraffa, wato yankin da aka fara hakewa a shekarun 1920.

translation.en: The militaristic nature of the Roman empire aided in the development of medical advances.
translation.ha: Yanayin Roman empire da ke dauke da salon soja ya taimaka wajen ci gaba a fanni lafiya.

translation.en: Doctors began to be recruited by Emperor Augustus and even formed the first Roman Medical Corps for use in the aftermath of battles.
translation.ha: Sarki Augustus ya fara daukar likitoci aiki inda har ya kafa Ƙungiyar Likitocin Rum ta farko domin anfani da ita bayan ƙare yaki.

translation.en: Surgeons had knowledge of various sedatives including morphine from extracts of poppy seeds and scopolamine from herbane seeds.
translation.ha: Likitocin fiɗa suna da ilimin magunguna daban-daban na kashe jiki wadanda suka hada da sinadarin morphine daga tsirrai da sikari da aka samo daga zirin herbane.

translation.en: They became proficient at amputation to save patients from gangrene as well as tourniquets and arterial clamps to stem blood flow.
translation.ha: Sun ƙware wajen yanke gaɓoɓi don kare masu ciwo daga ruɓewar sashen jiki da kuma kayan aikin matse jijiyoyi don tsayar da gudanar jini.

translation.en: Over multiple centuries, the Roman empire led to great gains in the field of medicine and formed much of the knowledge we know today.
translation.ha: A cikin ƙarnoni masu yawa, daular Rumawa ta ci riba a ɓangaren magunguna kuma ta samar da mafi yawancin ilimin da mu ka sani yanzu.

translation.en: Pureland origami is origami with the restriction that only one fold may be done at a time, more complex folds like reverse folds are not allowed, and all folds have straightforward locations.
translation.ha: Pureland origami shi ne origami da ƙuntatawan da akan iya nadi daya kawai a lokaci guda, ba a yarda da nadi mai wuya ba kamar nadin baya, da dukkan nadi suna da wurare kai tsaye.

translation.en: It was developed by John Smith in the 1970s to help inexperienced folders or those with limited motor skills.
translation.ha: John Smith ya kirkiro shi a cikin shekarar 1970 don taimakon masu adana fayiloli da ba su da ƙwarewa ko waɗanda ke da kuntatacciyar damar motsi.

translation.en: Children develop an awareness of race and racial stereotypes quite young and these racial stereotypes affect behavior.
translation.ha: Yara suna ɗaukar fahimta ta launin fata da tsana ta launin fata tun suna ƙanana kuma waɗannan tsana ta launin fata kan shafi halayya.

translation.en: For instance, children who identify with a racial minority that is stereotyped as not doing well in school tend to not do well in school once they learn about the stereotype associated with their race.
translation.ha: Alal misali, yaran da suke daga tsirarun kabilun da ake yi wa kallon basa wani abin kirki a makaranta akwai yiwuwar hakan ya dakushe himmarsu a makaranta da zarar sun fahimci cewa ana musu wani kallon-kallo saboda launin fatarsu.

translation.en: MySpace is the third most popular website used in the United States and has 54 million profiles currently.
translation.ha: MySpace shine shahararren gidan yanar gizo na uku mafi mashahuri a cikin Amurka kuma yana da bayanan martaba miliyan 54 a halin yanzu.

translation.en: These websites have gotten a lot of attention, especially in the education setting.
translation.ha: Waɗannan sassan yanar gizon sun ja ra’ayi sosai, musamman a ɓangaren ilimi.

translation.en: There are positive aspects to these websites, which include, being able to easily setup a class page which can include blogs, videos, photos, and other features.
translation.ha: Shafin yanar gizon na da amfani, wanda ya hada da damar bude wani shafin da zai kunshi, karamin shafin yanar gizo, hoto mai motsi da mara motsi da wasu abubuwan.

translation.en: This page can easily be accessed by providing just one web address, which makes it easy to remember and easy to type in for students who may have trouble using the keyboard or with spelling.
translation.ha: Za a iya shiga wannan shafin cikin sauƙi ta hanyar samar da adireshin yanar-gizo guda daya kawai, wanda ya ke da sauƙin tunawa da kuma sauƙin rubutawa ga ɗaliban da za su iya samun matsala ta amfani da keyboard ko a cikin rubutawa daidai.

translation.en: It can be customized to make it easy to read and also with as much or little color as desired.
translation.ha: Ana iya tsara shi domin saukin karantawa kuma tare da launi mai yawa ko launi kadan kamar yadda ake bukata.

translation.en: Attention Deficit Disorder "is a neurological syndrome whose classic defining triad of symptoms including impulsivity, distractibility, and hyperactivity or excess energy".
translation.ha: Ciwon Kasawar Hankali “cuta ce ta jijiyoyin wacce ta ke bayyana sa game da alamomin ciki har da rashin motsin jiki, daukan hnkali, da kuma kazar-kazar ko wuce haddi da tsananin kuzari”.

translation.en: It is not a learning disability, it is a learning disorder; it "affects 3 to 5 percent of all children, perhaps as many as 2 million American children".
translation.ha: Ba nakasa bane wajen koyo, rashin lafiya ne wurin koyo; yana “shafan kashi 3 zuwa 5 cikin dari na yara, kila kimanin miliyan 2 na yaran America”.

translation.en: Children with ADD have a hard time focusing on things like school work, but they can concentrate on things they enjoy doing like playing games or watching their favorite cartoons or writing sentences without punctuation.
translation.ha: Yara masu ADD suna fuskantar mawuyacin hali game da mayar da hankali akan ayyukan makaranta, amma zasu iya mayar da hankali kan abubuwan da suke so kamar su yiun wassani ko kallon shirin barkwancin da suka fi so ko rubuta jimloli ba tare da sa alamomin rubutu ba.

translation.en: These children tend to get into a lot of trouble, because they "engage in risky behaviors, get into fights, and challenge authority" in order to stimulate their brain, since their brain can not be stimulated by normal methods.
translation.ha: Waɗannan yara sukan shiga cikin matsala mai yawa, saboda suna “shiga halaye masu haɗari, shiga faɗa, kuma suna ƙalubalantar hukuma” don haɓaka ƙwaƙwalwarsu, tunda kwakwalwar ba za ta iya motsa su ta hanyoyin yau da kullun ba.

translation.en: ADD affects relationships with other peers because other children can not understand why they act the way that they do or why they spell they way they do or that their maturity level is different.
translation.ha: ADD yana shafar alaƙa da sauran takwarorinsu saboda wasu yara ba sa iya fahimtar abin da ya sa suke yin abin da suke yi ko kuma dalilin da ya sa suke yin rubutu kamar yadda suke yi ko kuma matakinsu na manya ya bambanta.

translation.en: As the ability to obtain knowledge and to learn changed in such a way as mentioned above the base rate at which knowledge was obtained changed.
translation.ha: Yadda damar samun ilimi da koyo ke canzawa kamar yadda a ka ambata a sama, tushen samun ilimin ya canza.

translation.en: The approach to obtaining information was different. No longer did pressure reside within individual recall, but the ability to recall text became more of a focus.
translation.ha: Matakin neman bayanin ya bambanta. yanzu babu sauran matsin lambar tunawa tare da mutum guda ya tuna, sai dai damar iya tuno rubutu ta zama akan maida hankali.

translation.en: In essence, the Renaissance made a significant change in the approach to learning and the dissemination of knowledge.
translation.ha: A takaice dai, sabon ilimin ya yi matukar tasiri wajen sauyi a yadda ake tafiyar da koyo da kuma yada ilimi.

translation.en: Unlike other primates, hominids no longer use their hands in locomotion or bearing weight or swinging through the trees.
translation.ha: Ba kamar sauran birrai ba, hominids baya amfani da hannayensu a cikin motsi ko ɗaukar nauyi ko jujjuyawa ta cikin bishiyoyi.

translation.en: The chimpanzee's hand and foot are similar in size and length, reflecting the hand's use for bearing weight in knuckle walking.
translation.ha: Hannun chimpanzee da ƙafa sun yi daidai da girma da tsayi, suna nuna amfanin hannun don ɗaukar nauyi a cikin yatsan ƙafa.

translation.en: The human hand is shorter than the foot, with straighter phalanges.
translation.ha: Hannun dan adam ya fi kafa gajarta, da kasusuwa miƙaƙƙu.

translation.en: Fossil hand bones two million to three million years old reveal this shift in specialization of the hand from locomotion to manipulation.
translation.ha: Busassun kasussuwan hannu wanda ke da shekaru miliyan biyu zuwa miliyan uku sun nunna wannan matsawa a kwarewa na hannun daga tafiya zuwa tasiri kan sarrafawa.

translation.en: Some people believe that experiencing many artificially induced lucid dreams often enough can be very exhausting.
translation.ha: Wasu mutane sun gaskata cewa fuskantar mafarkai da ba na hakika ba yawancin lokuta na iya jawo gajiya sosai.

translation.en: The main reason for this phenomenon is the result of the lucid dreams expanding the length of time between REM states.
translation.ha: Babban dalilin don wannan lamarin shi ne sakamakon mafarkai da ake iya ganewa da yake faɗaɗa tsawon lokacin tsakanin yanayoyin barcin REM.

translation.en: With fewer REMs per night, this state in which you experience actual sleep and your body recovers becomes infrequent enough to become a problem.
translation.ha: Karancin jujuyawar kwayar ido cikin barci (REMs) yanayin da kake samun bacci na hakika don baiwa jiki damar murmurewa, idan ya ta’azzara zai iya haifar da matsala.

translation.en: This is just as exhausting as if you were to wake up every twenty or thirty minutes and watch TV.
translation.ha: Wannan yana da gajiyarwa kamar kuna tashi kowane minti ashirin ko talatin ku kalli Talabijin.

translation.en: The effect is dependent on how often your brain attempts to lucidly dream per night.
translation.ha: Tasirin ya dogara ne akan yadda sau da yawa kwakwalwarka take ƙoƙarin yin mafarki mai kyau kowane dare.

translation.en: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya.
translation.ha: Abubuwa ba suyi kyau ba ga yan Italia a Arewacin Afirka kusan tun daga farko. A cikin mako guda da sanarwar yakin Italiya a ranar 10 ga Yuni, 1940, Turawan Birtaniyya na 11 sun kame Fort Capuzzo a Libya.

translation.en: In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci.
translation.ha: A wani harin kwanton-bauna da ke gabashin Bardia, Turawan ingila sun kame Babban Injiniyan Soja na Italia, Janar Lastucci.

translation.en: On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
translation.ha: A ranar 28 ga Yuni, aka kashe Marshal Italo Balbo, Gwamna-Janar na Libya kuma magaji ga Mussolini, ta hanyar kuskuren harbi yayin da yake sauka a Tobruk.

translation.en: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition.
translation.ha: Wasan takobi na zamani ya na da matakai daban daban, kama daga dalibai masu koyo a jami’a zuwa ga kwararru da kuma na gasar olympic.

translation.en: The sport is primarily played in a duel format, one fencer dueling another.
translation.ha: Ana buga wasan yawanci a wani tsarin gwagwarmaya, wani mai wasan takobi yana gogawa da wani.

translation.en: Golf is a game in which players use clubs to hit balls into holes.
translation.ha: Golf wani wasa ne da ƴan wasan ke amfani da sanduna domin buga ƙwallaye zuwa cikin ramuka.

translation.en: Eighteen holes are played during a regular round, with players usually starting on the first hole on the course and finishing on the eighteenth.
translation.ha: An buga ramuka goma sha takwas yayin zagaye na yau da kullun, tare da yan wasa galibi suna farawa akan rami na farko akan kwas ɗin kuma suna gamawa a ranar goma sha takwas.

translation.en: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins.
translation.ha: Ɗan wasan da ya ɗauki ƙarancin bugu, ko kuma jefin kulkin, don kammala sashen yake samu nasara.

translation.en: The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.
translation.ha: Akan buga wasan ne a kan ciyawa, inda a ke sassabe ciyawar da ke zagayen ramin wanda a ke kira kore.

translation.en: Perhaps the most common type of tourism is what most people associate with traveling: Recreation tourism.
translation.ha: Watakila yawon bude ido da aka fi sani shi ne wanda mutane ke alakantawa da tafiya: Yawon bude ido don nishaɗi.

translation.en: This is when people go to a place that is very different from their regular day-to-day life to relax and have fun.
translation.ha: Yanzu ne lokacin da mutane ke zuwa wani waje daban da irin wanda su ka saba yau da gobe domin hutawa da annashuwa.

translation.en: Beaches, theme parks and camp grounds are often the most common places frequented by recreational tourists.
translation.ha: Bakin tekuna, filin shakatawa da zangon hutawa su ne mafi wuraren da baki masu yawon bude ido ke fi zuwa.

translation.en: If the objective of one’s visit to a particular place is to get to know its history and culture then this type of tourism is known as cultural tourism.
translation.ha: Idan makasudin ziyarar mutum zuwa wani wuri shi ne sanin tarihinta da al'adunta to wannan nau'in yawon shakatawa an san shi da yawon bude ido game da al'adu.

translation.en: Tourists may visit different landmarks of a particular country or they may simply opt to focus on just one area.
translation.ha: Masu yawon bude ido na iya ziyartan alamar kasa dabam-dabam na wata kasa ko kuma suna iya mai da hankali waje daya.

translation.en: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements.
translation.ha: ‘Yan kama-wuri-zaunan, ganin wanna lamarin, sun nemi karin taimako..

translation.en: Troops reinforcing the forward positions included the 1st and 3rd New Hampshire regiments of 200 men, under Colonels John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals).
translation.ha: Runduna dake sahun matsayar gaba sun hada da dakaru na 1 da na 3 daga rundunar New Hampshire rajimantin maza 200, karkashin shugabancin Kanar John Stark da James Reed (dukkansu daga baya sun zama Janar).

translation.en: Stark's men took positions along the fence on the north end of the Colonist's position.
translation.ha: Mutanen Stark suka ja daga a jikin shingen ta karshen arewacin inda Colonist suka tsaya.

translation.en: When low tide opened a gap along the Mystic River along the northeast of the peninsula, they quickly extended the fence with a short stone wall to the north ending at the water's edge on a small beach.
translation.ha: Lokacin da karamin tashin ruwa ta bude rata daidai da Kogin Sufi wato Mystic River kusa da arewa maso gabas na mashigin teku, sun hanzarta shimfiɗa shinge tare da ɗan gajeren bangon dutse zuwa arewa wanda ke ƙare da gefen ruwa a karamin bakin teku.

translation.en: Gridley or Stark placed a stake about 100 feet (30 m) in front of the fence and ordered that no one fire until the regulars passed it.
translation.ha: Gridley ko Stark sun sanya gungumen da ke kusa da ƙafa 100 (mita 30) a gaban katangar kuma suka ba da umarnin cewa babu wanda zai yi wuta har sai masu doka sun wuce shi.

translation.en: The American plan relied on launching coordinated attacks from three different directions.
translation.ha: Amurka ta dogara da shirin ta na kai hari a jere daga sassa uku daban-daban.

translation.en: General John Cadwalder would launch a diversionary attack against the British garrison at Bordentown, in order to block off any reinforcements.
translation.ha: Janar John Cadwalder zai kaddamar da harin wuce gona da iri kan rundunar sojojin Burtaniya a Bordentown, don toshe duk wani karfafawa.

translation.en: General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping.
translation.ha: Janar James Ewing zai dauki mayaƙai 700 a hayin Kogin Trenton Ferry, kwace gada ta Assunpink Creek kuma ta hana duk wasu sojojin abokan gaba tserewa.

translation.en: The main assault force of 2,400 men would cross the river nine miles north of Trenton, and then split into two groups, one under Greene and one under Sullivan, in order to launch a pre-dawn attack.
translation.ha: Babbar rundunar farmakin mai dakaru 2,400 za ta ƙetara kogin a daidai mil 9 a arewacin Trenton, sannan su kasu gida biyu, ɗaya ƙarƙashin Greene da kuma ɗayan ƙarƙashin Sullivan, domin kai farmaki kafin asuba.

translation.en: With the change from the quarter to the half mile run, speed becomes of much less importance and endurance becomes an absolute necessity.
translation.ha: Da samun sauyi daga kwatan gudun rabin mil guda, batun gudu ya zama maras muhimmanci sosai yayin da jajircewa kuma ya zama wani abu na lallai.

translation.en: Of course a first-class half-miler, a man who can beat two minutes, must be possessed of a fair amount of speed, but endurance must be cultivated at all hazards.
translation.ha: Tabbas mai tseren rabin mil ta lamba daya, mutumin da zai iya kure minti biyu, dole ne ya mallaki saurin gudu, amma dole ne a sami juriya a kowane haɗari.

translation.en: Some cross country running during the winter, combined with gymnasium work for the upper part of the body, is the best preparation for the running season.
translation.ha: Wasu tseren ƙetare-ƙasa a lokacin hunturu, haɗe tare da aikin motsa jiki na ɓangaren sama na jiki, shine mafi kyawun shiri don lokacin gudu.

translation.en: Proper nutritional practices alone cannot generate elite performances, but they can significantly affect young athletes' overall wellness.
translation.ha: Tsarin abinci mai kyau kawai ba zai iya samar da ƙwazon fitattun mutane ba, amma suna iya tasiri sosai ga lafiyar 'yan wasa matasa gaba daya.

translation.en: Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport.
translation.ha: Kula da ƙoshin lafiya da daidaituwar karfin jiki, yin ɗabi'a mai kyau game da shayarwa, da fahimtar abubuwa daban-daban na ayyukan haɓaka na iya taimaka wa 'yan wasa su inganta ayyukansu kuma su ƙara jin daɗin wasanni.

translation.en: Middle distance running is a relatively inexpensive sport; however, there are many misconceptions regarding the few pieces of equipment required to participate.
translation.ha: Matsakaicin gudun nesa wasa ne mara tsada; Koyaya, akwai ra'ayoyi da yawa game da ƙananan kayan aikin da ake buƙata don shiga.

translation.en: Products can be purchased as needed, but most will have little or no real impact on performance.
translation.ha: Za a iya siyan kaya kamar yadda ake bukata,amma yawanci zasu zama marasa fa’ida kadan ko sosai akan aikin.

translation.en: Athletes may feel that they prefer a product even when it provides no real benefits.
translation.ha: Ƴan wasan motsa jiki na iya jin cewa sun fi son wani kaya ko da ba shi da wani ainihin amfani.

translation.en: The atom can be considered to be one of the fundamental building blocks of all matter.
translation.ha: Ana ganin atom ɗin a matsayin muhimmin abun da ke gina duk wani abu.

translation.en: Its a very complex entity which consists, according to a simplified Bohr model, of a central nucleus orbited by electrons, somewhat similar to planets orbiting the sun - see Figure 1.1.
translation.ha: Abu ne mai matuƙar wuyar sha’ani da ya haɗa da, bisa ga sassauƙan tsarin Bohr, na tsakiyar nucleus wanda electrons suka zagaye, ya yi kama da taurarin da ke kewaye da rana - duba Hoto na 1.1.

translation.en: The nucleus consists of two particles - neutrons and protons.
translation.ha: Tsakiya kwayar halittar ta kunshi abubuwa guda biyu-yayan kwayoyin zarra mara cajin lantarki da mai caji karbar wuta.

translation.en: Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge.
translation.ha: Protons na dauke da cajin wutan lantarki mafi soyuwa yayin da ita Neutron bata dauke da wutan lantarki. Electrons suna da cajin wutan lantarki mummuna.

translation.en: To Check the victim, you must first survey the scene to ensure your safety.
translation.ha: Kafin a Duba wanda aka mishi laifi, dole ne ka farko bincike wurin don tabbatar da tsaronka.

translation.en: You need to notice the victim's position as you approach him or her and any automatic red flags.
translation.ha: Kuna buƙatar lura da matsayin wanda aka azabtar yayin da kuka kusanci shi ko ita da kowane tutocin wuta ta atomatik.

translation.en: If you get hurt trying to help, you may only serve to make matters worse.
translation.ha: Idan kun ji rauni yayin ƙoƙarin taimako, kawai kuna iya sa al'amura su kara taɓarɓarewa.

translation.en: The study found that depression, fear and catastrophising mediated the relationship between pain and disability in lower back pain sufferers.
translation.ha: Binciken ya gano cewa damuwa, tsoro da bala'i sun daidaita dangantakar da ke tsakanin ciwo da nakasassu a masun fama da ciwon baya.

translation.en: Only the effects of catastrophizing, not depression and fear was conditional of regular weekly structured PA sessions.
translation.ha: Sakamakon bala'i ne kawai, ba shiga damuwa da tsoro ba ya kasance sharaɗin ganawar sati-sati karkashin tsarin PA.

translation.en: Those participating in regular activity required more support in terms of negative perception of pain distinguishing the differences of chronic pain and discomfort feel from normal physical movement.
translation.ha: Wadanda suka sunduma cikin ayuka na yau da kullum na bukatar taimako wajen sauya mummunar tunani na zafi tare da bambanta tsakanin tsananin radadi da rashin sukuni da juyawar gabobi ke haifarwa.

translation.en: Vision, or the ability to see depends on visual system sensory organs or eyes.
translation.ha: Gani, ko ikon iya ganin ya dogara a kan hanyoyin gani na gabbai ko idanuwa.

translation.en: There are many different constructions of eyes, ranging in complexity depending on the requirements of the organism.
translation.ha: Akwai tsaruka daban-daban na yadda ido ke aiki, wanda su ka danganta da bukatuwar halitta.

translation.en: The different constructions have different capabilities, are sensitive to different wave-lengths and have differing degrees of acuity, also they require different processing to make sense of the input and different numbers to work optimally.
translation.ha: Kowane irin gini da irin nasa bukatun, kowanne da irin basirar da aka yi amfani wajen samar da shi, don haka kowanne da irin kayan aikin da ya ke bukata yadda a karshe zai bada ma’ana cikakkiya.

translation.en: A population is the collection of organisms of a particular species within a given geographic area.
translation.ha: Yawan jama'a yana nufi tarin halittu na wani jinsi na musamman a cikin wani keɓaɓɓen wurin ƙasa.

translation.en: When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic.
translation.ha: Idan mutane a cikin yawan jama'a suka zama iri daya dangane da wani irin dabi'a na musamman wato phynotypic trait ana kiran su monomorphic.

translation.en: When the individuals show several variants of a particular trait they are polymorphic.
translation.ha: Lokacin da ɗaiɗaikun mutane suka nuna mabambantan nau’uka masu yawa na wata keɓaɓɓiyar ɗabi’a su masu banbanin ƙwayar halitta ne.

translation.en: Army ant colonies march and nest in different phases as well.
translation.ha: Sojojin tururuwa suna tafiya da mazauni a matakai daban-daban kuma.

translation.en: In the nomadic phase, army ants march at night and stop to camp during the day.
translation.ha: A farko jigilarsu, gungun kwarin na sintiri ne da daddare sai da rana su huta.

translation.en: The colony begins a nomadic phase when available food has decreased. During this phase, the colony makes temporary nests that are changed everyday.
translation.ha: Mulkin mallaka ya fara matakin makiyaya lokacin da wadatar abinci ya ragu. A wannan lokacin, mulkin mallaka yana yin gidajan wucin gadi waɗanda ake canza su yau da kullun.

translation.en: Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days.
translation.ha: Kowane ɗaya daga waɗannan har-hare ko tafiyar baroro tana ɗaukar kimanin kwanaki 17.

translation.en: What is a cell? The word cell comes from the Latin word "cella", meaning "small room", and it was first coined by a microscopist observing the structure of cork.
translation.ha: Menene tantanin halitta? Kalmar cell ta fito ne daga kalmar Latin “cella”, ma'ana “ƙaramin ɗaki”, kuma masanin hangen nesa mai lura da tsarin abin toshe kwalaba ne ya ƙirƙira shi.

translation.en: The cell is the basic unit of all living things, and all organisms are composed of one or more cells.
translation.ha: Ƙwayar halitta ita ce tushen dukkan abubuwa masu rai, kuma kowacce halitta ta kunshi kwayar halitta ɗaya ko fiye da haka.

translation.en: Cells are so basic and critical to the study of life, in fact, that they are often referred to as "the building blocks of life".
translation.ha: Kwayoyin halitta mai rai suna da matukar mahimmanci wajen nazarin rayuwa, shi ya sa ake kiransu da tubalin gina rayuwa.

translation.en: The Nervous System maintains homeostasis by sending nerve impulses through out the body to keep the flow of blood going as well as undisturbed.
translation.ha: Tsarin Sadarwar Jiki (Nervous System) yana kula da daidaitun yanayin cikin jiki ta hanyar aika saƙonnin motsin jijiyoyi a gabadayan jiki don kula da yadda jini yake gudana ba tare da matsala ba.

translation.en: These nerve impulses can be sent so quickly throughout the body which helps keep the body safe from any potential threat.
translation.ha: Ana iya turo waɗannan bugawar jijiya da wuri a dukkan jiki wanda hakan yake taimaka jikin ya zama da lafiya daga wani haɗari mai iya tasowa.

translation.en: Tornadoes strike a small area compared to other violent storms, but they can destroy everything in their path.
translation.ha: Mahaukaciyar guguwa ta afkawa wani ƙaramin yanki idan aka kwatanta da sauran guguwa masu ƙarfi, amma suna iya lalata komai a hanyar su.

translation.en: Tornadoes uproot trees, rip boards from buildings, and fling cars up into the sky. The most violent two percent of tornadoes last more than three hours.
translation.ha: Guguwa kan tuge bishiyoyin, su yage falankai daga jikin gine-gine, sannan su yi wurgi da motoci zuwa sama. Kashi biyu na guguwa masu tsananin ƙarfi kan wuce tsawon awanni uku.

translation.en: These monster storms have winds up to 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).
translation.ha: Wadannan mugayen guguwar suna ɗauke da iska har zuwa 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).

translation.en: Humans have been making and using lenses for magnification for thousands and thousands of years.
translation.ha: ‘yan Adam sun kasance suna kerawa da amfani da tabarau mai nuna girman abu shekaru dubbai da suka wuce.

translation.en: However, the first true telescopes were made in Europe in the late 16th century.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, an yi ainihin na'urar hangen nesa na fari a Turai a karshen karni na 16.

translation.en: These telescopes used a combination of two lenses to make distant objects appear both nearer and larger.
translation.ha: Na’urar hangen nesa tayi amfani da gilashi biyu domin sanya abubuwa dake nesa su dawo kusa kuma babba.

translation.en: Greed and selfishness will always be with us and it is the nature of cooperation that when the majority benefit there will always be more to gain in the short term by acting selfishly
translation.ha: Son kai da zalama za su ci gaba da kasancewa da mu kuma tsarin hadin kai ne kawai zai amfani mutane yayin da ta hanyar nuna son rai kuma na dan karamin lokaci ne kawai za a ga gajiyar hakan.

translation.en: Hopefully, most people will realise that their long term best option is to work together with others.
translation.ha: Fatan shi ne, mutane da dama su gane cewa a karshe za su fi samun moriya idan sun hada kansu da sauran jama’a.

translation.en: Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant.
translation.ha: Mutane da yawa suna tunanin ranar da ɗan adam zai iya tafiya zuwa wata tauraruwa domin bincika wasu duniyoyi, wasu mutane suna mamakin abin da ke can wasu sun gaskata cewa akwai bakon tsararin sama ko wasu rayuwa da ke akwai a wata duniya.

translation.en: But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are "neighbors".
translation.ha: Amma, idan wannan ya taɓa faruwa tabbas ba zai faru na dogon lokaci ba. Taurari sun bazu sosai cewa akwai miliyoyin mil tsakanin taurari waɗanda “maƙwabta” ne.

translation.en: Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?
translation.ha: Wataƙila wata rana, ‘ya’yan jikokinka za su tsaya a kan duniyar baƙin halittu suna mamaki game da magabatansu na zamanin baya?

translation.en: Animals are made of many cells. They eat things and digest them inside. Most animals can move.
translation.ha: An halici dabobi ne ta kwayoyin hallita dayawa. Suna cin abubuwa kuma su sarrafa su a ciki. yawanci dabobi na iya motsi.

translation.en: Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains).
translation.ha: Dabbobi ne kawai ke da kwakwalwa (kodayake ba duk dabbobi ke da shi ba; misali, jellyfish, misali, ba su da kwakwalwa).

translation.en: Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky.
translation.ha: Ana samun dabobi a ko in a doran kasa. suna tona kasa, iyo a cikin ruwa, da kuma tashi a sama.

translation.en: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism.
translation.ha: Kwayar hallita ita kashin tsari da kuma mai aiki mafi ƙarami na wani hallita (abubuwa) mai rai.

translation.en: Cell comes from the Latin word cella which means small room.
translation.ha: kalmar Cell ta samo asali ne daga Latin wacce ke nufin karamin daki.

translation.en: If you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made of small squares or balls.
translation.ha: Idan ka kalli abubuwa masu rai ta ƙarƙashin madubin makuroskof, za ka ga cewa abubuwa ne ƙanana masu kusurwa huɗu.

translation.en: Robert Hooke, a biologist from England, saw small squares in cork with a microscope.
translation.ha: Robert Hooke, masanin ilimin halittu daga Ingila, ya ga ƙananan murabba'ai a cikin abin toshe kwalaba tare da microscope.

translation.en: They looked like rooms. He was the first person to observe dead cells
translation.ha: Suna kama da ɗakuna. Shi ne mutum na farko da ya lura da matattun ƙwayoyin halittaa

translation.en: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change.
translation.ha: Daidaikun sinadarai ko dunkulensu na iya canza yanayi ba tare da sun canza ba a karan kansu.

translation.en: Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same.
translation.ha: Nitrogen a matsayin gas har yanzu yana da sinadarai iri ɗaya kamar nitrogen na ruwa. Yanayin ruwa ya fi yawa amma kwayoyin sun kasance iri ɗaya.

translation.en: Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.
translation.ha: Ruwa ma wani misali ne. Mahadin ruwa ya kunshi ƙwayoyin halitta biyu na sinadarin hydrogen da ƙwayar halittar oxygen daya.

translation.en: It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid.
translation.ha: Yana da siffa iri guda ko da kuwa iska ce ko ruwa-ruwa ko kuma ma abu mai kauri.

translation.en: Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
translation.ha: Kodayake yanayin jikinta na iya canzawa, yanayin sinadaran ba ya canja wa.

translation.en: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand.
translation.ha: Lokaci wani abu ne wanda yake kewaye da mu, kuma yana shafan duk abin da muke yi, duk da haka yana da wuyar fahimta.

translation.en: Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years.
translation.ha: Masana, kama daga na addini, masu falsafa da masana kimiyya sun yi shekaru dubbai su na nazari a kan Lokaci.

translation.en: We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past.
translation.ha: Muna wayar lokaci a matsayin wani jeri na abubuwan da ke wucewa daga zamani na gaba ta cikin zamanin yanzu zuwa zamanin baya.

translation.en: Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events.
translation.ha: Wata fassarar ta lokaci ita ce yadda mu ke kwatanta tsawon faruwar wasu abubuwa.

translation.en: You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.
translation.ha: Za ka iya ƙayyade wucewar lokaci da kanka ta hanyar dubawa maimaitawaar wani al'amura mai juyawa. Wani al'amura mai juawa wani abu ne da yake faruwa akai-akai ne.

translation.en: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos.
translation.ha: A zamanin yanzu ana amfani da kwamfutoci wajen jirkita hotuna da bidiyoyi.

translation.en: Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films.
translation.ha: Zane-zane masu kayatarwa za a iya samun su a kwamfutoci, kuma irin wadannan zane-zanen suna ci gaba da samun karbuwa a telebijin da finafinai.

translation.en: Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.
translation.ha: Ana yin rikodin waƙoƙi sau da yawa ta amfani da ƙwararrun kwamfutoci don sarrafawa da haɗa sautuka tare.

translation.en: For a long time during the nineteenth and twentieth centuries, it was believed the first inhabitants of New Zealand were the Maori people, who hunted giant birds called moas.
translation.ha: A tsawon lokaci a karnoni na goma sha tara da ashirin, an yi imanin cewa mazaunan farko na New Zealand su ne mutanen Maori, waɗanda suka yi farautar manya-manyan tsuntsaye da ake kira moas.

translation.en: The theory then established the idea that the Maori people migrated from Polynesia in a Great Fleet and took New Zealand from the Moriori, establishing an agricultural society.
translation.ha: Daga nan ƙa’idar ta tabbatar da ra’ayin cewa mutanen Maori sun yi kaura daga Polynesia a wata Babbar Kwambar Jiragen ruwa sannan suka karbe New Zealand daga Moriori, inda suka kafa al’ummar manoma.

translation.en: However, new evidence suggests that the Moriori were a group of mainland Maori who migrated from New Zealand to the Chatham Islands, developing their own distinctive, peaceful culture.
translation.ha: Koyaya, sabbin shaidu sun nuna cewa Moriori wasu kungiya ce ta birnin Maori ne wanda suka yi hijira daga New Zealand zuwa Tsibirin Chatham, suna haɓaka al'adunsu na musamman, na zaman lafiya.

translation.en: There was also another tribe on the Chatham islands these were Maori who migrated away from New Zealand.
translation.ha: Akwai wani kabila a tsibirir Chatham sune yan Maori wadanda suka yi hijira daga New Zealand.

translation.en: They called themselves the Moriori there were a few skirmishes and in the end, the Moriori were wiped out
translation.ha: Suna kiran kansu da suna Moriori akwai wasu rikita-rikita a karshen lamarin, an shafe Moriori.

translation.en: Individuals who had been involved for several decades helped us appreciate our strengths and passions while candidly assessing difficulties and even failures.
translation.ha: Mutune da suka kasance a lamarin cikin gomman shekaru sun taimake mu wajen fahimtar karfinmu da kuma jarabarmu yayin da kuma muke la’akari da wahalhalun da ke ciki har ma da matsalolin ciki.

translation.en: While listening to individuals share their individual, family, and organizational stories, we gained valuable insight into the past and some of the personalities who influenced for good or ill the culture of the organization.
translation.ha: Yayin sauraren kowa da kowa yana bayar da labaran kansa ko na iyali da kuma na wuraren aiki/kungiya, muna samun muhimman bayanai da suka gabata na mutanen da suka yi tasiri ta hanya mai kyau ko akasin haka game da tsari ko dabi’un kungiya/wurin aiki.

translation.en: While understanding one’s history does not assume understanding of culture, it does at least help people gain a sense of where they fall within the history of the organization.
translation.ha: Yayin fahimtar tarihin wani ba a daukar fahimtar aladun, ya kan taimakawa mutane wajan gane a gurbin da suke a tarihin maaikatar.

translation.en: While assessing the successes and becoming aware of failures, individuals and the whole of the participating persons discover more deeply the values, mission, and driving forces of the organization.
translation.ha: Yayin auna cigaban da aka samu tare da fahimtar gazawa, ɗaiɗaikun mutane tare da duk waɗanda suke cikin shirin sun ƙara gano darajoji, manufa, da kuma al’amuran da ke tafiyar da ma’aikatar.

translation.en: In this instance, recalling previous instances of entrepreneurial behavior and resulting successes helped people to be open to new changes and new direction for the local church.
translation.ha: A wannan misalin, tuna wasu misalan da suka gabata na halayyar kirkire-kirkire da kuma nasarar da suka haifar ya taimakawa mutane wajen fahimtar sabbin sauye-sauyen da kuma alkiblar cocin wurin.

translation.en: Such success stories lessened the fears of change, while creating positive inclinations toward change in the future.
translation.ha: Wadannan labaran nasarorin sun sassauta girman fargabar sauyin, yayin da yake saka tunanin sauyin da za a iya samu a gaba.

translation.en: Convergent thinking patterns are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution.
translation.ha: Tsarin tunani mai canzawa dabaru ne na warware matsaloli waɗanda ke haɗa ra'ayoyi daban-daban ko fannoni don nemo mafita.

translation.en: The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information.
translation.ha: Abinda tunaninka zai mai da hankali kai su ne, sauri, fikira da dacewa, tabbatar da gaskiyar zance, sake yin amfani da dabaru da ake da su na tattara bayanai.

translation.en: The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong.
translation.ha: Abu mafi mahimmanci a wannan tunanin shine: amsa guda daya ce kawai ta ke daidai. Kuna tunanin amsoshi biyu ne kawai, su ne daidai ne ko ba daidai ba.

translation.en: This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures.
translation.ha: Irin wannan tunanin ana nasabta shi ne da wani tsarin kimiyya ko kuma tabbatattun tsare-tsare.

translation.en: People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.
translation.ha: Mutane masu irin wannan tunanin na da basirar tunani, suna iya hardace tsari, su warware matsaloli kuma su yi aiki akan gwaje-gwajen kimiyya.

translation.en: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others.
translation.ha: 'Yan Adam sun fi kowane nau'in halittu da baiwa a cikin karatun zuciyar wasu.

translation.en: That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire.
translation.ha: Ma'ana shine muna iya hasashe daidai game da abinda wasu mutane ke iya tsinkaya, ko su ke nufi, ko imani da shi ko su ka sani ko kuma su ke muradi.

translation.en: Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin baiwar shine, fahimtar abin da wasu mutane ke nufi yana da matuƙar muhimmanci. Yana ba mu damar warware rikitattun al’amura na ayyukan zahiri da wasu su ka aikata.

translation.en: For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car.
translation.ha: Misali, idan kaga wani yana fasa tagar mota, za ka yi tsammani ya na kokarin sace motar wani ne.

translation.en: He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.
translation.ha: Ya kamata a yi masa adalci kasancewar ya jefar da mukullan motarsa ne sakamakon haka ya ke kokarin balle kofar motar tasa.

translation.en: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University).
translation.ha: MRI ya danganta ne ga faruwar kimiyyar lissafi da ake kira rawar makaman nukiliya wato Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR), wanda Felix Bloch ya gano a shekarun 1930 (yayin da ya ke aiki a Jami’ar Stanford) da Edward Purcell (daga Jami’ar Harvard).

translation.en: In this resonance, magnetic field and radio waves cause atoms to give off tiny radio signals.
translation.ha: A wannan jijjigar, sararin maganaɗiso da kuma sautin rediyo suna sanya ƙwayoyin zarra su ba da ƙananan sigina na rediyo.

translation.en: In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis.
translation.ha: A shekara ta 1970, Raymond Damadian, likita kuma masanin kimiyya mai bincike, ya gano madogarar amfani da hton rawar magnet wato magnetic resonance imaging a matsayin kayan aiki don gano cuta a asibiti.

translation.en: Four years later a patent was granted, which was the world's first patent issued in the field of MRI.
translation.ha: Bayan shekaru hudu an ba da izini lambar mallakar kira, wanda shi ne farkon lambar kira a duniya da aka bayar a cikin fannin MRI.

translation.en: In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1977 ne, Dr. Damadian ya kammala aikin kirkirar na’urar MRI ta farko a tarihi, wadda ya kira da “gagara misali”.

translation.en: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others.
translation.ha: Hanyar Sadarwar ta asynchronous tana ƙarfafa lokacin yin tunani da kuma samun damar amsa wa wasu.

translation.en: It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information.
translation.ha: Yana ba wa dalibai daman yin aiki cikin hanzarinsu da iyakance hanzarinsu na kayan koyarwa da bayani.

translation.en: In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998)
translation.ha: Bugu da kari, akwai karancin takunkumin lokaci tare da yiwuwar sassaucin lokutan aiki. (Bremer, 1998)

translation.en: The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times.
translation.ha: Yin amfani da intanet da yanar gizo yana bawa masu koyon samun dama ga bayyanai a kowane lokaci.

translation.en: Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.
translation.ha: Dalibai na iya gabatar da tambayoyi ga malamai a kowane lokaci na rana kuma suyi tsammanin amsoshi cikin gaggawa, maimakon jiran har sai ganawa ta gaba da gaba.

translation.en: The postmodern approach to learning offers the freedom from absolutes. There is no one good way to learn.
translation.ha: Mahangar zamanin ga koyo yana ba da 'yanci daga kafaffun ƙa’idoji. Babu wata hanya mai kyau don koyo.

translation.en: In fact, there is not one good thing to learn.Learning takes place in the experience between the learner and the knowledge presented.
translation.ha: A takaice dai, babu wani abun da za a koya. Koyarwa tana faruwa ne a tsakanin mai koyo da kuma karantarwar da ake yi.

translation.en: Our current experience with all the do-it-yourself and information presenting, learning-based television shows illustrates this point.
translation.ha: Abin da muke fuskanta a yanzu da duk wani yi-da-kanka da gabatar da bayani, shirye-shiryen talabijin na koyo ya nuna haka.

translation.en: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge.
translation.ha: Da yawa daga cikinmu sun sami kanmu muna kallon wani talibijin da ke ba mu labarin wani tsari ko ƙwarewa wanda ba za mu taɓa shiga ko amfani da wannan ilimin ba.

translation.en: We will never overhaul a car, build a fountain in our backyard, travel to Peru to examine ancient ruins, or remodel our neighbour's house.
translation.ha: Ba za mu taɓa yi wa mota garambawul ba, gina maɓuɓɓugar ruwa a ciki filin bayan gidan mu, mu yi tafiya zuwa Peru don nazarin gidajen mutanen dā, ko kuma yi wa gidan maƙwabtcin mu kwaskwarima.

translation.en: Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access.
translation.ha: Godiya ga haɗe-haɗen kebur na fiber optic a ƙarƙarshin teku zuwa ga Turai da kuma tauraron ɗan Adam mai yawan faɗi, Greenland yana a haɗe sosai kuma 93% a cikin jam'arsa suna da damar ga haɗin yanar-gizo.

translation.en: Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi.
translation.ha: Otel dinka ko kuma wanda zai dauki bakoncinka (Idan yana zama a gidan ajiye baki ko kuma a gidansa) zai zama yana da maganadisun intanet na WIFI ko kwamfuta mai intanet kuma dukkan wuraren suna da shagunan intanet.

translation.en: As mentioned above, though the word "Eskimo" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda aka ambata a sama, kodayake kalmar “Eskimo” ya kasance karɓaɓɓiya a cikin Amurka, ana ɗaukar sa mai daɗaɗawa ga yawancin mutanen da ba 'yan Amurka ba da asalin mutanen Arctic, musamman ma Kanada.

translation.en: While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners.
translation.ha: A yayin da akwai yiwuwar jin kalmar da ‘yan asalin Greenland ke amfani dashi, ya kamata ‘yan waje su guji yin amfani da ita.

translation.en: The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland.
translation.ha: Mazaunan asali na Greenland kan kira kansu da Inuit a ƙasar Canada da kuma Kalaalleq (jam’i Kalaallit), mutumin Greenland, a Greenland.

translation.en: Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no "rough areas."
translation.ha: Laifi, da kuma ƙiyayya game da yan hijira gabaɗaya, kusan ba a sani ba a cikin Greenland. Ko da a cikin garuruwa, babu “yankuna masu kauri.”

translation.en: Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face.
translation.ha: Wataƙila yanayin sanyi shi ne kaɗai haƙiƙar barazanar da wanda bai shirya ba zai fuskanta.

translation.en: If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing.
translation.ha: Idan ka ziyarci Greenland a lokutan sanyi (sanyin na karuwa ne idan ka kara gaba ta arewa), yana da muhimmanci a kawo wadatattun sutura.

translation.en: The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues.
translation.ha: Tsawon kwanakin a lokacin bazara na iya haifar da matsalolin samun isasshen bacci da alaƙar kiwon lafiya.

translation.en: During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating.
translation.ha: Lokacin zafi, kuma ku lura da sauron yankin ƙasashen Nordic. Duk da cewa ba sa yaɗa wata cuta, amma suna da damuwa.

translation.en: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified.
translation.ha: Kasancewar tattalin arzikin San Francisco an fi alakanta shi da harkokin yawon bude ido, tattalin arzikin a hakika ya shafi fannoni da dama.

translation.en: The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism.
translation.ha: Ɓangarorin da suka fi samar da aiki su ne ayyukan ƙwararru, gwamnati, fannin kudi, ciniki, da yawon buɗe ido.

translation.en: Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world.
translation.ha: Yawan nuna ta cikin wake wake, fina-finai, adabi da karbabbun al'adun zamani, ya taimaka wajen sanya garin zama fitacce a fadin duniya.

translation.en: San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities.
translation.ha: San Francisco ta samar da wani katon gini na ‘yan yawon shakatawa da ke da otal da dama, gidajen abinci, da kuma fitattun kayayyakin zamani.

translation.en: San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
translation.ha: San Francisco shi ma ya zama wani waje a kasar domin samun wasu nau’ukan abincin yankin Asiya: kamar Korea da Thailand da Indiya da kuma Japan.

translation.en: Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families.
translation.ha: Tafiya zuwa Duniyar Walt Disney tamkar wani aikin hajji ne ga akasarin iyalai a Amurka.

translation.en: The "typical" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home.
translation.ha: Irin wanna ziyarar ta kunshi sauka a Filin jirgin saman Orlando, da shiga otal din Disney, yin kusan mako guda ba tare da barin inda Disney ta ke ba, sannan komawa gida.

translation.en: There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of "going to Disney World".
translation.ha: Akwai abubuwa da dama da ke iya faruwa, abinda mutane da yawa ke nufi idan su na maganar “Zuwa wurin wasa na Disney”.

translation.en: Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets.
translation.ha: Da yawan tikitin da ake sayarwa a shafukan yanar gizo a irinsu eBay da Craigslist, suna kasancewa wadanda ake maimaita amfani da su ne.

translation.en: While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa al’amarin ya zama ruwan dare, Disney ta haramta yin haka: ba’a iya gusar da tikitocin.

translation.en: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit.
translation.ha: Duk wani sansani da za a yi Grand Canyon yana bukatar amincewar kasar.

translation.en: Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month.
translation.ha: An iyakance izini don kare kwazazzabon, kuma ana ba da dama a ranar 1 ta wata, watanni huɗu kafin watan farawa.

translation.en: Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan.
translation.ha: Don haka, izinin karkara na kowace farawa a watan Mayu zai kasance a ranar 1 ga Janairu.

translation.en: Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations.
translation.ha: Sarari ga mafi mashahuri yankuna, kamar Bright Angel Campground kusa da makiyaya ta Phantom, tana cika da sakon nema a ranan farko na bude daman neman shiga.

translation.en: There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.
translation.ha: Akwai iya adadin yawan izini da aka ajiye domin buƙatu na shiga-ciki da ake samu a tsarin wadanda ya fara zuwa shi zai fara samu.

translation.en: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes.
translation.ha: Shiga Kudancin Afirka da mota hanya ce mai ban mamaki don ganin duk kyawawan yankin da kuma zuwa wurare daga hanyoyin yawon buɗe ido na yau da kullun.

translation.en: This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4.
translation.ha: Za a iya yin hakan karamar mota tare da matukar tsari na kulawa sosai amma 4/4 shi aka fi aminta da shi kuma wurare da dama sai da mota mai 4/4 za a iya shigarsu.

translation.en: Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are.
translation.ha: A sa a rai cewa duk da cewa akwai zaman lafiya a kudanci afirka ba kowacce makwabciyar kasa a yankin ke zaune lafiya ba.

translation.en: Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from.
translation.ha: Bukatar Bizar da kuma kudinta ya banbamta daga kasa zuwa kasa kuma yana da nasaba da kasar da ka zo.

translation.en: Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.
translation.ha: Haka kuma kowace ƙasa tana da dokoki na musamman waɗanda ke buƙatar irin abubuwa na gaggawa da ya kamata su kasance a cikin mota.

translation.en: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana.
translation.ha: Victoria Falls dai wani gari ne da yake a wani yankin kasar Zimbabwe kan iyaka daga garin Livingstone na kasar Zambia, kuma kusa da Botswana.

translation.en: The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay.
translation.ha: Garin na nan da an wuce mabugar ruwa daga dutse, kuma shine abu mafi jan hankali, sanannen wajen yawon bude idon zai baiwa yan yawon kasada da masu sha’awar kalle-kalle damar dogon zama a wajen.

translation.en: In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic.
translation.ha: A lokacin damuna (Nuwamba zuwa Maris), yawan ruwan zai karu inda Mafaɗar ruwa za ta zama mai ban mamaki.

translation.en: You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls.
translation.ha: Babu makawa sai kun jike idan kuka ketare gadar ko yin tafiya a kusa da hanyar mai kwane-kwane a kusa da mabugar ruwan.

translation.en: On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!
translation.ha: A daya hannun, ya tabbata cewa saboda ruwa mai yawa yayi tsiri sama, shi yasa ya kare maka mafadar ruwa.

translation.en: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king.
translation.ha: Kabarin Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 na iya zama mafi shahararrun kaburbura a cikin kwari, wurin da Howard Carter ya gano 1922 na kusan binne masarauta na matashin sarki.

translation.en: Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration.
translation.ha: Idan aka kwatanta da wasu kaburburan masarauta, kodayake, kabarin Tutankhamun yana da ƙimar isa a ziyarce shi, yana da ƙanƙan da ƙarancin ado.

translation.en: Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible.
translation.ha: Duk mai sha’awar ganin shaidar barnar da gawa ta yi yayin yunƙurin cire shi daga cikin akwatin gawa zai yi baƙin ciki tunda kai da kafaɗu kawai ake gani.

translation.en: The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.
translation.ha: Dukiyar da ke cikin kabarin ba ta cikin ta, amma an cire ta zuwa Gidan Tarihi na Masar da ke Alkahira.

translation.en: Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.
translation.ha: Yana da kyau baƙi masu ƙarancin lokaci su yi amfani da lokacin a wani wuri daban.

translation.en: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman.
translation.ha: Phnom Krom, kilomita 12 kudu maso yamma na Siem Reap. An gina wannan haikalin da ke kan tudu a ƙarshen ƙarni na 9, a zamanin Sarki Yasovarman.

translation.en: The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile.
translation.ha: Yanayin lalacewar wurin ibadar da kuma duba kan tafkin Tonle Sap ya sanya hawa tsaunin ya zama da kyau.

translation.en: A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake.
translation.ha: A saukake za a iya hade ziyara zuwa wurin da tafiya da kwalwkwale zuwa tafkin.

translation.en: The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.
translation.ha: Ana buƙatar izinin Angkor don shiga haikalin don haka kar a manta da kawo fasfo ɗinku yayin tafiya zuwa Tonle Sap.

translation.en: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital.
translation.ha: Birnin Ƙudus shine babban birni kuma birni mafi girma a Isra’ila, kodayake yawancin kasashe da kuma Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya ba su amince da shi a matsayin babban birnin ƙasar Isra’ila ba.

translation.en: The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years.
translation.ha: Tsohon birni a cikin Yahudiya yana da tarihi mai ban sha'awa yana ɗaukar dubban shekaru.

translation.en: The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center.
translation.ha: Birnin mai tsarki ne ga addinai uku da suka gaskanta da ubangiji daya - Yahudanci, Kiristanci da Musulunci, sannan yana zama a matsayin cibiyar tsarkake ruhi, addini, da al’ada.

translation.en: Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel.
translation.ha: Saboda mahimmancin birnin a addinance, musamman tsofaffin wurare na tsohon birnin, Birnin Kudus ya zama cibiyar yawon bude ido a kasar Israila.

translation.en: Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.
translation.ha: Baitul maqdis tana da wuraren tarihi da yawa, na gargajiya da na al'adu, tare da kuɗaɗe da cibiyoyin cin kasuwa, gidajen shakatawa, da gidajen abinci.

translation.en: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points.
translation.ha: Ecuador na bukatar cewa sai ‘yan kasar Cuba sun samu wasikar gayyata kafin shiga Ecuador ta filayen jiragen sama na ƙasa da ƙasa ko kuma wuraren shiga na kan iyaka.

translation.en: This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements.
translation.ha: Dole ne Ma'aikatar Harkokin Wajen Ecuador, ta halasta sahihancin wannan wasiƙa, kuma ta cika wasu buƙatu.

translation.en: These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries.
translation.ha: Wadannan ka’idoji an samar da su domin tsara yadda hijira tsakanin kasashen za ta rika gudana.

translation.en: Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement.
translation.ha: Yan kasan Cuba da ke da green card na US su ziyarci Ecuadorian Consulate domin karban kebewa daga wannan umurni.

translation.en: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.
translation.ha: Dole takardar shigar ka ta zama karbabbe na akalla wata 6 bayan ainihin ranar tafiyar ka. Ana bukatar tiketin tafiyar shiga da fita domin tabbatar da yawan ranakun da zaka zauna a kasar.

translation.en: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate.
translation.ha: Yawan bude ido cikin jama’a ya fi saukin kudi, don haka idan kai kadai ne ko kana tare da abokin tafiya daya, yi kokari ka hadu da sauran mutane domin hada kungiya na mutum hudu zuwa shidda domin samun farashi mai sauki.

translation.en: However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars.
translation.ha: Koda yake kada wannan ya dame ka, saboda yawanci yan yawon bude ido ana cusa su cikin motoci domin a cikasu.

translation.en: It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.
translation.ha: Da alama wata hanya ce ta yaudarar mutane su kara biyan kudade.

translation.en: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins.
translation.ha: Wanda tsawonsa ya yi wa ƙuryar arewacin Machu Picchu rumfa tsauni ne mai santsi, wanda yawanci ya zama farfajiyar baya a hotunan kufayin da dama.

translation.en: It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes.
translation.ha: Akwai alamar jan aiki daga ƙasa, kuma hawa ne mai tsawo da wahala, amma yawancin mutane masu lafiya za su iya kaiwa cikin kusan mintuna 45.

translation.en: Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail.
translation.ha: An jejjera duwatsun takawa a kan hanyar, a can sama kuma akwai igiyoyin karfe da ke dauke da karafunan da ake dafawa da hannu.

translation.en: That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly.
translation.ha: Bayan fadin wannan, sa ran kasa yin numfashi, kuma ka kula a cikin bangarori masu santsi, musamman yayin da ka ke jike, saboda zai iya zama mai haɗari cikin sauri.

translation.en: There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.
translation.ha: Akwai wani karamin kogo kusa da saman da dole ne a wuce ta wurin, ya yi ɗan ƙasa kuma matsetse sosai.

translation.en: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835.
translation.ha: Ganin wuraren da kuma dabbobin daji na Galapagos zai fi kyau a cikin kwalekwale, yadda Charles Darwin ya yi a 1835.

translation.en: Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers.
translation.ha: Fiye da tekuna guda 60 suna tafiya cikin ruwan Galapagos - girman su daga fasinjoji 8 zuwa 100.

translation.en: Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season).
translation.ha: Yawancin mutane suna yin ajiyar wurin su sosai kafin lokaci (saboda galibin kwale-kwalen cike suke a lokacin babban kaka).

translation.en: Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships.
translation.ha: A tabbatar da cewa wakili wanda aka bi ta hannunsa gwanin Galapagos ne wanda yake da masaniya kan ire-iren jiragen ruwa.

translation.en: This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.
translation.ha: Wannan zai tabbatar da cewa ainihi ra’ayinka da/ko gazawarka sun dace da jirgin ruwan da ya fi dacewa da su.

translation.en: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile.
translation.ha: Kafin Spanish ta zo a cikin ƙarni na 16, arewacin Chile yana ƙarƙashin mulkin Inca yayin da 'yan asalin Araucanians (Mapuche) suke zaune a tsakiya da kudancin Chile.

translation.en: The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence.
translation.ha: Mapuche suma suna daga cikin kungiyoyin asalin Amurkawa masu cin gashin kai na baya, waɗanda ba su cika bin dokar mulkin Spanish ba har sai bayan Chileancin Chile.

translation.en: Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
translation.ha: Kodayake Chile ta ayyana yanci kai a 1810 (a lokacin yaƙe-yaƙen Napoleonic wanda ya bar Spain ba tare da gwamnatin tsakiya mai aiki ba har tsawon shekaru), ba a sami nasarar cin nasara akan Spanish ɗin ba sai 1818.

translation.en: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti
translation.ha: Jamhuriyar Dominican (Da Sifaniyanci: República Dominicana) ƙasa ce da ke yankin Caribbean da ta kunshi rabin gabashin tsibirin Hispaniola, wanda su ka yi tarayya da kasar Haiti a cikinsaa

translation.en: Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo.
translation.ha: Bayan gaɓar teku masu farin yashi da yanayin mai tsaunuka, a ƙasar ce ake da birnin Turai mafi tsufa a yankin Americas, wanda yanzu ya ke ɓangaren Santo Domingo.

translation.en: The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE.
translation.ha: Taínos da Caribes su suka fara zama a tsibirin. Caribes mutane ne masu magana da harshen Arawakan waɗanda suka isa kusan 10,000 BCE.

translation.en: Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors
translation.ha: Cikin shekaru kaɗan bayan zuwan Turawa masu yawon bincike, yawan jama’ar Tainos ya ragu matuka sakamakon mayakan sifaniyawa yan mulkin mallakaa

translation.en: Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.
translation.ha: Dangane da Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) tsakanin 1492 da 1498 masu nasara daga Spain sun kashe kusan Taínos 100,000.

translation.en: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building.
translation.ha: Jardín de la Unión. An gina wannan sarari azaman tashar ƙarfe na ƙarfe na 17 na ƙarni, wanda Templo de San Diego shine kadai gidan da ya tsira.

translation.en: It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night.
translation.ha: Yanzu yana aiki azaman tsakiyar filin wasa, kuma koyaushe yana da abubuwa da yawa da ke gudana, dare da rana.

translation.en: There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo.
translation.ha: Akwai gidajen abinci da yawa da ke kewaye da lambu, kuma da yamma a can galibi ana ba da kade kade kyauta daga gazebo ta tsakiya.
