translation.en: Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend.
translation.ha: Callejon del Beso (Alley na Kiss). Falon baranda biyu da santimita 69 kacal suka rabu gida ne na tsohuwar tatsuniyar soyayya.

translation.en: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.
translation.ha: A ‘yan kwabbai kadan wasu yara za su ba ka labarin.

translation.en: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more.
translation.ha: Tsibirin Bowen sanannen tafiya rana daya ne ko ziyarar koyo na karshen mako da ke samar da wasan kwalekwale, tattakin kan dutse, shaguna, gidajen abinci, da wasu.

translation.en: This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver.
translation.ha: Al’ummar ta hakika na nan a Howe Sound idan ka wuce garin Vancouver, kuma ana iya shiga ta hanyar kwalekwalen haya da ke tashi daga tsibirin Granville dake garin Vancouver.

translation.en: For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential.
translation.ha: Domin waɗanda ke jin daɗin yin harkoki a waje, tattaki daga kan Teku zuwa farfajiyar Sama yana da muhimmanci.

translation.en: Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics.
translation.ha: Whistler (tuki na awa 1.5 daga Vancouver) yana da tsada amma sananne ne saboda Wasannin Olympics na lokacin sanyi na 2010.

translation.en: In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
translation.ha: A lokaci hunturu, ji dadi da gudun ski mafi kyau a North America, sannan da bazara a gwada hawan dutse a keke na kwarai da gaske.

translation.en: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena.
translation.ha: Dole ne a bayar da izinin lokaci kafin. Dole ne ya zama na kana da izinin kasancewa a Sirena tun farkon dare har wayewar gari.

translation.en: Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service.
translation.ha: Sirena ne tashar gandun daji da ke samar da masaukin kwana da abinci mai zafi tare da kwanan sansani. La Leona, San Pedrillo, da Los Patos na samar da sansani ne kawai ba tare da abinci ba.

translation.en: It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards
translation.ha: Mai yiwuwa ne samun izinin wurin shakatawa kai tsaye daga Tashar Gandun Daji a Puerto Jiménez, amma ba su karbar katunan kuɗi.

translation.en: The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival.
translation.ha: Hukumar Kula da Wurin Shaƙatawar (MINAE) ba ta bayar da izinin shiga na sama da wata ɗaya kafin lokacin isowa da ake tsammani.

translation.en: CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.
translation.ha: CafeNet El Sol suna ba da sabis na ajiyar kuɗi don ƙimar US $ 30, ko $ 10 don wucewar kwana ɗaya; cikakkun bayanai akan shafin Corcovado.

translation.en: The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean.
translation.ha: Tsibirin Cook tsibiri ce wanda ba ta da alaka tare da New Zealand, wanda ke cikin Polynesia, a tsakiyar Tekun Pacific ta Kudu.

translation.en: It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean.
translation.ha: Wani rukunin tsibirai ne da ke da tsibirai 15 da suke warwatse a faɗin kilomitar teku miliyan 2.2 km2.

translation.en: With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as "Hawaii down under".
translation.ha: Da yankin lokaci iri daya da na Hawaii, wasu lokuta a kan ɗauki tsibiran a matsayin “Hawaii ta can ƙasa”.

translation.en: Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development.
translation.ha: Kodayake ƙarami ne, yana tunatar da wasu tsoffin maziyarta na Hawaii kafin samin ƙasa ba tare da duk manyan otal na ‘yan yawon shakatawa da kuma sauran cigaba.

translation.en: The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
translation.ha: Tsibiran Cook ba su da wasu birane amma suna da tsibirai daban-daban har 15. Manyan cikinsu su ne Rarotonga da Aitutaki.

translation.en: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form.
translation.ha: A ƙasashen da suka ci gaba a yau, an ɗaukaka samar da wurin kwana mai daraja da karin kumallo zuwa wani nau'i na fasaha.

translation.en: At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast.
translation.ha: Daga karshe dai, B&Bs tana gasa ne a abubuwar musamman guda biyu: shimfidas da abincin karya kumallo.

translation.en: Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda ya dace, mutum yana iya dacewa da samun gadon gurma a itin wanan kyakyawar kadamarwar, watakila wanda aka yi da hannu a murkushe ko tsohon gado.

translation.en: Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish.
translation.ha: kumallo na iya haɗawa da kayan ɗanɗano na yankin ko kuma abincin musamman na mai masauki.

translation.en: The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.
translation.ha: Yanayin ya kasance tsohon gini mai tarihi mai dauke da kayayyakin gargajiya, filin yanka farce da kuma wurin iyo.

translation.en: Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity.
translation.ha: Shiga cikin motarka sannan ka kama doguwar hanyar tafiya yana da wani shauƙi na jin dadi kawai cikinsa.

translation.en: Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations.
translation.ha: Ba kaman manyan motoci ba, maiyiwuwa kafi sabawa da tuka motar ka kuma kasan iyakokinta.

translation.en: Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention.
translation.ha: Kafa tenti a kaddara na musamman ko kuma cikin gari na iya jawo hankalin jama’a cikin sauki wanda ba’a so.

translation.en: In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to "camp".
translation.ha: A takaice, yin amfani da motarka wata babbar hanya ce zuwa tafiya a kan hanya amma ba ko wace lokaci ba hanya ce na “zango”.

translation.en: Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down.
translation.ha: Kwanan daji a mota ya fi dadi idan kana amfani da samfurin manyan motoci irinsu SUV, Sedan ko Station Wagon, wadanda ke da kujeru da ake iya kwantar da su.

translation.en: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries.
translation.ha: Wasu otal suna da kayan tarihi tun zamanin zinariya na hanyar jirgin kasa da layin teku; kafin yakin duniya na biyu, a cikin karni na 19 ko farkon karni na 20.

translation.en: These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife.
translation.ha: Waɗannan otaloli sun kasance inda masu arziki da kuma sanannu na yau za su zama, kuma sau da yawa suna da wurin cin abincin dare mai kyau da kuma rayuwar dare.

translation.en: The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character.
translation.ha: Tsoffin kayan aiki, da rashin sabbin abubuwan more rayuwa, da kuma wasu tsufa ma na daga cikin halayen su.

translation.en: While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries.
translation.ha: Yayin da galibi suka kasance mallakin jama’a, a wasu lokutan kuma su kan karbi bakoncin shugabannin kasashe da ma wasu manyan mutane masu alfarma.

translation.en: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
translation.ha: Matafiyi da ke da tarin kudade na iya shirya zagaya duniya, ya rika tsayawa a wurare ya kwana cikin wasu daga dimbin ota-otal.

translation.en: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit.
translation.ha: Gamayyar musayar karrama baƙi ita ce ƙungiyar da ke sadar da matafiya da mutanen yankin a garuruwan da za su ziyarta.

translation.en: Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification.
translation.ha: Shiga cikin rukunin nan, a wasu lokutan yana bukatar cike wata takadda ta Intanet: duk da yake wasu ma su kan bukaci karin tantancewa.

translation.en: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers.
translation.ha: Jerin sunayen wadanda za su karbi bakin yana nan an wallafa shi ko dai a jaridu ko kuma a yanar gizo, a wasu lokutan ma har da karin bayani da sharhin wasu matafiyan.

translation.en: Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay.
translation.ha: An kafa kamfanin Couchsurfing ne a watan Janairun 2004 bayan da masanin na'urar kwamfuta Casey Fenton ya sami jirgi mai arha zuwa Iceland amma bai sami wurin zama ba.

translation.en: He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
translation.ha: Ya turo saƙon imel zuwa ga ɗalibai a jam'iar ta gida kuma ya samu wani gagarumin yawan taya don masauki na kyauta.

translation.en: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too.
translation.ha: An samar da Gidajen otal din ne domin matasa - yawancin baki zaka samu basu wuce shekaru ashirin ba- amma kuma sau da yawa ana samun matafiya tsofaffi a wajen.

translation.en: Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.
translation.ha: Iyalai tare da yara abu ne mai wuya, amma wasu gidajen kwanan suna ba su damar a ɗakuna masu zaman kansu.

translation.en: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics.
translation.ha: Birnin Beijing a kasar China ita ce mai masaukin baki gasar Olympic na lokacin sanyi na 2022, Wannan zai sanya birnin ta zama na farko da ta daukin nauyin mai masaukin baki na gasar a lokacin sanyin da na zafi.

translation.en: Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events.
translation.ha: Beijing za ta karbi bakoncin budewa tare da rufe bukukuwan wasanni kan kankara na cikin daki.

translation.en: Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
translation.ha: Sauran abubuwan da za a yi a tseren kankara za su kasance ne a yankin wasan tsere na Taizicheng da ke Zhangjiakou, kimanin kilomita 220 (mil mil 140) daga Beijing.

translation.en: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar.
translation.ha: Yawancin dakunan bautar na da bukukuwan shekara-shekara da kan fara daga ƙarshen Nuwamba zuwa Tsakiyar Mayu, bambancin ranakun sun danganta da irin jerin kidayar watanni a shekarar da kowane ɗakin bauta ke aiki da ita.

translation.en: Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple.
translation.ha: Yawancin bukukuwan haikalin ana yin su ne a matsayin ɓangare na ranar tunawa da haikalin ko bikin ranar haihuwar allahntaka ko wani babban taron da ke hade da haikalin.

translation.en: Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
translation.ha: Bukukuwan ibada na Kerala suna da ban sha'awa don gani, tare da jerin gwanon giwaye da aka kawata, ƙungiyar makaɗa ta haikali da sauran shagalin.

translation.en: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences.
translation.ha: Bukin Nune-nune na Duniya (da aka fi kira da Nunawa, ko a sauƙaƙe Nuni) wani babban taron ƙasa da ƙasa ne kan fasahar ƙirƙira da kuma kimiyya.

translation.en: Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history.
translation.ha: Kasashen da ke halartar taron sun gabatar da fasahohi da ilimai a dandalin kasashen su domin nuna wa duniya irin al’adu da tarihinsu.

translation.en: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants.
translation.ha: Bikin kasa-da-kasa na ayyukan noma shiri ne na musamman wanda ke nuna tsirrai, kayan lambu da duk wasu abubuwa da ke alaka da tsirrai.

translation.en: Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not.
translation.ha: Ko da yake a ka'ida za su iya faruwa a kowace shekara (muddin suna cikin ƙasashe daban-daban), a aikace ba haka suke ba.

translation.en: These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.
translation.ha: Wadannan al'amuran suna kasancewa a kowane lokaci tsakanin watanni uku zuwa shida, kuma tana gudana ne a fili mai fadin hectares 50 zuwa sama.

translation.en: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest.
translation.ha: Akwai nau'ikan yadda ake nadar fina-finai da yawa waɗanda aka yi amfani da su tsawon shekaru. Wanda aka fi amfani da shi shine mai kaurin 35 mm (36 by 24 mm).

translation.en: It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR.
translation.ha: Ana iya mayarwa cikin sauki idan ya kare kuma yana iya bada ƙuduri na kusan kwatankwacin DSLR na yanzu.

translation.en: Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative.
translation.ha: Wasu matsakaika-girman kamarorin fim suna amfani da girma 6cm ta 6cm, mafi daidai a 56mm ta 56mm babu.

translation.en: This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
translation.ha: Wannan na bada haske kusan sau huɗu fiye da dodo fim 35 mm (3136 mm2 versus 864).

translation.en: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment.
translation.ha: Dabbobin daji suna daga cikin mahimman ƙalubalen zane ga mai ɗaukar hoto, kuma yana buƙatar haɗuwa da sa'a, haƙuri, kwarewa da kayan aiki masu kyau.

translation.en: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words.
translation.ha: Galibi ba a dauki sana’ar daukar hoton namun daji a da muhimmanci ba, amma kamar sana’ar daukar hoton gaba dayanta, hoto ya fi tasiri nesa ba kusa ba kan dubban kalmomi.

translation.en: Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses.
translation.ha: Hoto na namun daji galibi yana buƙatar dogon ruwan tabarau na telephoto, kodayake abubuwa kamar garken tsuntsaye ko ƙaramin halitta suna buƙatar wasu ruwan tabarau.

translation.en: Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes.
translation.ha: Yawancin dabbobi masu ban sha'awa suna da wuyar samu, kuma wuraren shakatawa wasu lokuta suna da ƙa'idodi game da ɗaukar hoto don dalilan kasuwanci.

translation.en: Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
translation.ha: Dabbobin daji ko dai suna iya kasancewa masu gudun mutane ko kuma mafaɗata. Muhalli na iya zama mai sanyi, zafi, ko akasin haka mai ƙuntatawa.

translation.en: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers.
translation.ha: Duniya tana da yare fiye da 5,000, yaruka dabam-dabam, gami da sama da ashirin da miliyan 50 ko da masu magana.

translation.en: Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly.
translation.ha: Rubutattun kalmomi sau da yawa suna da sauƙin fahimta fiye da kalmomin magana, kuma. Wannan gaskiya ne musamman ga adiresoshin, waɗanda galibi suna da wahalar furtawa cikin fahimta.

translation.en: Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people.
translation.ha: A wasu kasashen kusan kowa na jin turanci, amma a wasu da yawa ba haka abin ya ke ba musamman tsakanin matasa.

translation.en: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto.
translation.ha: Ka yi tunanin, idan za ka so, wani Mancunian, Boston, Jamaica da Sydneysider zaune a kusa da tebur suna cin abincin dare a wani gidan abinci a Toronto.

translation.en: They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.
translation.ha: Suna nishadantar da juna da labaru na garuruwansu, suna fadinsa a harsuna dabam-dabam na gida.

translation.en: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food.
translation.ha: Siyan abinci a cikin manyan shaguna shine galibi hanya mafi arha don ciyarwa. Ba tare da damar dafa abinci ba, zaɓuɓɓuka suna iyakance ga abincin da aka shirya.

translation.en: Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food.
translation.ha: Yawancin manyan kantuna su na dada samun sassa na kayan abincin ci kai tsaye daban daban. Wasu ma kan samar da na’urar dumama abinci.

translation.en: In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
translation.ha: A wasu ƙasashe ko nau'ikan shagunan saida akwai aƙalla ɗakin cin abinci na kantin sayar da yanar gizon, galibi marassa tushe ne wanda yake da tsada.

translation.en: Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you.
translation.ha: ka tabbatar ka ɗauka bugu na manufofinka da bayanan hulɗar mai inshorar tare da kai.

translation.en: They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims.
translation.ha: Suna bukatar a nuna adireshin imel na mai inshorar da kuma lambobin wayar kasahsen duniya domin bayar da shawarwari da kuma yin ikirari.

translation.en: Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud").
translation.ha: Ka sami wani bugun a cikin kayan ka da kuma kan layi (imel da kanka tare da abin da aka makala, ko adana shi a cikin “gajimare”).

translation.en: If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet).
translation.ha: Idan kuna tafiya tare da naurar kwamfutar tafi-da-gidanka ko kwamfutar hannu, adana kwafi a cikin ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya ko faifai (mai sauƙi ba tare da yanar gizo ba).

translation.en: Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help.
translation.ha: Hakanan bayar da manufofi / kwafin layin waya ga abokan tafiya da dangi ko abokai na gida masu son taimakawa.

translation.en: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat.
translation.ha: Mosse (wandanda kuma aka sani da elk) ba a san su da faɗa ba, amma za su kare kansu idan suka zaci ana yi musu barazana.

translation.en: When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.
translation.ha: Idan mutane basu ga hatsin suna da hatsarin gaske ba, suna iya kusantowa kusa dasu kuma su jefa kansu cikin hadari.

translation.en: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important.
translation.ha: A sha kayan barasa a sannu da hankali. Domin giya na tasiri daban daban ga mashayanta, don haka sanin gejinka na da mahimmanci.

translation.en: Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol.
translation.ha: Matsaloli lafiya masu yiwuwa na dogon lokaci daga yawan shaye-shaye na iya haɗawa da lalacewar hanta har ma makanta da mutuwa. Haɗarin mai yiwuwa yana ƙaruwa lokacin shan giyan da baya bisa ƙa'ida.

translation.en: Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
translation.ha: Samfurorin giya na fasa kwauri na iya kunsar sinadarai masu hadari irinsu methanol, wanda ke iya haddasa makanta ko ma mutuwa ko da kadan ne suka shiga jiki.

translation.en: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower.
translation.ha: Tabarau na iya fin araha a kasashen waje musamman kasashe matalauta inda biyan ma’aikata ke da rahusa.

translation.en: Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere.
translation.ha: Yi la'akari da samun gwajin ido a gida, musamman idan yana ƙarkashin inshora, sannan taho da takardar maganin don cike shi a wani wuri.

translation.en: High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
translation.ha: Frames shahararrun kuma masu tsada da ake samu a wuraren na iya samun matsaloli guda biyu, wasu basu da kwari kuma na hakikar da aka shigo da su daga waje na da tsada fiye da na gida.

translation.en: Coffee is one of the world's most traded commodities, and you can probably find many types in your home region.
translation.ha: Kofi yana daya daga cikin kasuwancin duniya, kuma tabbas za ku iya samun nau'ikan da yawa a yankinku.

translation.en: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, akwai hanyoyi daban-daban na shan kofi a faɗin duniya wanda zai yi kyau mutum ya samu masaniya.

translation.en: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water.
translation.ha: Shigarwar canyon (ko: Canyoneering) shi ne shigarwar ƙasan ramin canyon, wanda yake ko bussashe ko a cike da ruwa.

translation.en: Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
translation.ha: Canyoning ya haɗu da abubuwa daga iyo, hawa da tsalle - amma yana buƙatar ɗan horo kaɗan ko siffar jiki don farawa (idan aka kwatanta da hawan dutse, wasan ruwa ko tseren kankara, misali).

translation.en: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails.
translation.ha: Yin yawo wata aiki ne na waje wanda ya ƙunshi tafiya cikin yanayin halitta, yawancin lokaci kan hanyar yawon.

translation.en: Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day.
translation.ha: Tattakin rana ya ƙunshi nisan da ba su kai mil daya ba har zuwa nisa masu tsawon da za a iya kaiwa a cikin rana guda.

translation.en: For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them.
translation.ha: Don tattakin rana guda ta kan sassauƙar hanya ana buƙatar ‘yan shirye-shirye, kuma duk wani mutum mai matsakaiciyar lafiy zai iya jin daɗin su.

translation.en: Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
translation.ha: Iyalai masu kananan yara na iya bukatar ƙarin shirye-shirye, amma shafe rana daya a waje zai yiwu ko da ma tare da jarirai da kananan yara da basu shiga makarantu ba ne.

translation.en: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently.
translation.ha: A fadin duniya akwai kimanin ƙungiyoyi kusan 200 masu zaman kansu wadanda ke gudanar da harkokin yawon shaƙatawa.

translation.en: The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents.
translation.ha: Magajin Global Runnning Tours, Go Running Towers ta hada cibiyoyi sadarwa da yawa na masu gudu a nahiyoyi hudu.

translation.en: With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
translation.ha: Da asali daga Zagayen Tseren Barcelona na Barcelona da kuma Ttseren Copenhagen na Copenhagen, nan da nan sai Zagayen Tseren Pague da ke Prague da wasu suka shigo.

translation.en: There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere.
translation.ha: Akwai abubuwa da yawa da ya kamata ayi la'akari da su kafin kuma lokacin tafiya wani wuri.

translation.en: When you travel, expect things not to be like they are "back home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live.
translation.ha: Idan kana bulaguro kada ka yi tsammani abubuwa za su kasance yadda ka san su a gida. Halayya, dokoki, abinci, zirga-zirgar abin hawa, masauki, ƙa'idodi, harshe da sauransu za su iya bambanta daga inda ka ke zaune.

translation.en: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things.
translation.ha: Wannan abu ne da ya kamata a sa a rai kodayaushe, don kaucewa samun rashin jin daɗi ko ma watakila bacin rai akan yadda bisa al’ada mutanen yankin ke yin abubuwansu.

translation.en: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries.
translation.ha: Kamfanonin tafiye-tafiye sun kasance tun karni na 19. Wakilin tafiye-tafiye galibi zaɓi ne mai kyau don tafiya wanda ya wuce abin da ya gabata na balaguro na ɗabi'a, al'ada, yare ko ƙasashe masu ƙarancin kuɗi.

translation.en: Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations.
translation.ha: Kodayake yawancin hukumomi suna shirye su ɗauki mafi yawan rijista na yau da kullun, wakilai da yawa sun ƙware kan wasu nau'ikan tafiye-tafiye, jeri na kasafin kuɗi ko inda ake so.

translation.en: It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours.
translation.ha: Zai fi kyau a yi amfani da wakili wanda yawanci lokaci Siya tiketi irin zuwa irin wuri daya.

translation.en: Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
translation.ha: Lura da irin tafiye-tafiyen da wakili ke gabatarwa, ko a shafin yanar gizo ko a cikin taga shago.

translation.en: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that.
translation.ha: Idan kana son kallon duniya a araha, saboda bukatun dole, salon rayuwa ko kalubale, akwai wasu hanyoyin yin hakan.

translation.en: Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter.
translation.ha: A takaice, sun faɗi cikin ɓangarori biyu: Ko a yi aiki a yayin tafiya ko kuma takaita kashe kuɗi. Wannan bayani ta mayar da hankali a na ƙarshen.

translation.en: For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel.
translation.ha: Ga waɗanda za su iya sadaukar da kasancewa a wurin da su ke jin dadin zama, lokacinsu da hasashen rage kudaden da su ke kashewa sosai zai sa su iya shirya tafiya wadda ba zata ci kudi sosai ba.

translation.en: The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
translation.ha: Shawarwar tana daukar cewa matafiya ba sa sata, wuce iyaka, yin mu’amala a haramtacciyar kasuwa, roƙo, ko kuma yin amfani da wasu mutane don ribar kan su.

translation.en: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle.
translation.ha: Wurin bincike na jami’an shige da fice yawanci shi ne wurin tsayawar farko yayin sauka daga jirgin sama, jirgin ruwa, ko kuma wani abin hawa.

translation.en: In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains.
translation.ha: A wasu jiragen kasa masu duban kan iyaka ana gudanar da bincike ne a yayin da jirgin ke tafiya kuma lallai ne ya zama kana da Katin Shaida lokacin da za ka shiga daya daga cikin irin wadannan jiragen.

translation.en: On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
translation.ha: A jirgin mai bacci na dare, mai gudanarwa na iya karban fasfo domin kada a dameka yayinda kake bacci.

translation.en: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities.
translation.ha: Rajista wata ƙarin buƙata ce ta tsarin visa. A wasu ƙasashe, dole ne a yi rajistar kasancewarka da adireshin inda kake zaune tare da hukumomin yankin.

translation.en: This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices.
translation.ha: Wannan na iya buƙatar cike fom tare da yan sanda na gida ko ziyarar ofisoshin shige da fice.

translation.en: In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask).
translation.ha: A ƙasashe da dama da ke da irin wannan doka, gidajen otal na yanki ke gudanar da rijistar (don haka tabbata ka tambaya).

translation.en: In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
translation.ha: A wasu lamuran kuma, wadanda suke zama a wajen wuraren zaman masu yawon bude ido ne kawai za su yi rajista. Ko da yake, hakan ya sa dokar ta zama wata iri, da bata fito baro-baro ba.

translation.en: Architecture is concerned with the design and construction of buildings. The architecture of a place is often a tourist attraction in its own right.
translation.ha: Tsara gine-ginen, tsari ne wanda ya jibanci kirkira da gina wurare. Tsarin gini yawanci na da tasiri wajen jawon hankalin masu yawon bude ido.

translation.en: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold.
translation.ha: Yawancin gine-ginen suna da kyan gani da kuma kallo daga dogon gini ko daga tagar da aka yi cikin hikima kan iya zama abin kyau da za a kalla.

translation.en: Architecture overlaps considerably with other fields including urban planning, civil engineering, decorative arts, interior design and landscape design.
translation.ha: Tsarin gine-gine ya cakudu da wasu sassa irinsu tsarin birane, ayyukan gini, kwalliyar gidaje, kwalliyar cikin dakuna da na waje.

translation.en: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.
translation.ha: Ta yadda yawancin pueblos ɗin suke da nisa, ba za ku iya samun inda ake hada-hadar dare sosai ba tare da kun yi tafiya zuwa Albuquerque ko Santa Fe ba.

translation.en: However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe).
translation.ha: Duk da haka akasarin gidajen caca da aka lissafa suna bayar da abun sha kuma yawanci suna nishadantarwa na arziki (musamman manyan dake zagaye da Albuquerque da Santa Fe kai tsaye).

translation.en: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out.
translation.ha: A yi hattara: kananan gidajen giya a garin nan wurare ne da ka iya zama hadari ga baki daga wata jihar.

translation.en: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
translation.ha: Kan abu daya, arewacin New Mexico na da manya matsaloli da tuki cikin maye, da kuma taruwan direbobi bugaggu ta yi yawwa kusa da mashayan kananan garuwa.

translation.en: Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti.
translation.ha: Abubuwan da ba'a so ko makararrun rubutu an san shi azaman graffiti.

translation.en: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa ba sabon salon zamani ba ne, yawancin mutane watakila na alakanta shi da yadda matasa ke lalata wuraren jama’a ta hanyar amfani da fenti su yi zane-zane.

translation.en: However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, a zamanin yau akwai ingantattun masu fasahar zane, abubuwan zane-zane da kuma “bangon shari'a” zanen. Graffiti a cikin wannan mahallin yawanci suna kama da ayyukan adabi maimakon alamun haramun.

translation.en: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.
translation.ha: Boomerang jefawa sanannen fasaha ne da yawon bude ido ke son koya.

translation.en: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning.
translation.ha: Idan kana son ka koyi jefa boomerang da ke dawowa hannunka, ka tabbatar kana da boomerang din da ya dace mai komowa.

translation.en: Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
translation.ha: Yawancin majefi da ake samu a Australia a haƙiƙa ba masu dawowa ba ne. Yana da kyau ‘yan koyo kada su gwada jefawa a yanayin iska.

translation.en: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground.
translation.ha: Ana dafa Abincin Hangi a cikin wani rami mai zafi a cikin ƙasa.

translation.en: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot.
translation.ha: Ana dumama ramin ne ko dai da duwatsu masu zafi daga wuta, ko a wasu wuraren zafin ƙasa kan sanya zagayen tsandaurin ƙasa ya yi zafi.

translation.en: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner.
translation.ha: A kan yi amfani da hangi don dafa abincin dare irin na gargajiya.

translation.en: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
translation.ha: Wurare da yawa a Rotorua na samar da hangi na murhun rami, yayin da wasu hangi ana samu a Christchurch, Wellington da wasu wurare.

translation.en: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
translation.ha: MetroRail yana tsarin fasinjoji biyu a cikin jiragen kasa wadanda ke ciki da wajen Cape Town: MetroPlus (mai tsada na mawadata) da kuma Metro (mai araha na talakawa).

translation.en: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
translation.ha: MetroPlus ya fi kwanciyar hankali kuma ba shi da cunkoson jama'a amma ya fi tsada sosai, kodayake har yanzu ya fi tikitin jirgin ƙasa na yau da kullun a Turai.

translation.en: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
translation.ha: Kowane jirgin ƙasa yana da MetroPlus da masu horar da Metro; masu koyawa MetroPlus koyaushe suna kan ƙarshen jirgin ƙasa mafi kusa da Cape Town.

translation.en: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
translation.ha: Daukawa wa wasu - Kar ku bar jakunanku inda baku ganin su ba, musamman idan kuna ƙetarewar iyakokin ƙasashen waje.

translation.en: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
translation.ha: Za ka iya samun kanka ana amfani da kai a matsayin mai dakon ƙwayoyi ba tare da saninka ba, wanda zai jefa ka cikin gagarumar matsala.

translation.en: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
translation.ha: Wannan ya hada da jira a layi, saboda ana iya amfani da karnukan da ke shakar magani a kowane lokaci ba tare da sanarwa ba.

translation.en: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
translation.ha: Wasu ƙasashe suna aiwatar da hukunci mai tsanani ko da a kan masu laifukan farko ne; waɗannan na iya haɗawa da ɗauri a gidan kurkuku da ya wuce shekaru 10 ko mutuwa.

translation.en: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
translation.ha: Jaka da ba a sata ba, makasudin sata ne kuma kan iya jan hankulan mahukunta saboda tsoron barazanar bam.

translation.en: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
translation.ha: A gida, saboda wannan yawan mu’amala da ƙwayoyin cuta na gida, akwai yiyuwar cewa tuni kun riga kun saba da su.

translation.en: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
translation.ha: Amma a wasu ɓangarorin duniya, inda sabin halittar bakteriyar dabbobin a gare ku, zai yiwu ku shiga matsaloli.

translation.en: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
translation.ha: Hakanan, a cikin yanayin dumi kwayoyin cuta na girma da sauri kuma suna da tsawon rai a wajen jiki.

translation.en: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
translation.ha: Don haka annobar Delhi Belly, Tsinuwar Fir'auna, Ɗaukar Fansar Montezuma, da abokan su da yawa.

translation.en: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda matsalolin manumfashi suke a wurare masu yanayin sanyi, ana yawan samun matsalolin hanji a wurare masu yanayin zafi inda kuma lokuta da dama suna da ban haushi na daban amma ba hapipar haɗari ba.

translation.en: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
translation.ha: Idan ka na tafiya a cikin kasashe masu tasowa a karon farko--ko a sashe na duniya da baka sani ba - ka tanaji ganin abubuwa da su ka sha banban da al’adunka.

translation.en: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
translation.ha: Yawancin matafiya nutsatststsu na fuskantar kalubale sakamakon sabbin ci gaba a harkar tafiye-tafiye a duniya, yadda kananan canje-canje na al’ada ke karuwa cikin gaggawa.

translation.en: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
translation.ha: Musamman a kwanakinka na farko, yi la’akari da saukarwa kan salon yamma da ingantaccen masauki, abinci, da hidimomi na taimakawa wurin sabawa da yanayi.

translation.en: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
translation.ha: Karka yi barci a katifa ko taburma a yankin ƙasa in da ka a san fauna na gida ba.

translation.en: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
translation.ha: Idan zaku yada zango, kawo sansannin sansanin ko guduma don kiyaye ku daga macizai, kunama da irin wannan.

translation.en: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
translation.ha: Cika gidanka da wadataccen kofi da safe da kuma shayin shakatawa mai kyau na dare.

translation.en: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
translation.ha: Lokacin da kake kan hutu, kuna da lokacin da za ku kula da kanku kuma ku ɗauki yan mintuna kaɗan don ƙirƙirar wani abu na musamman.

translation.en: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
translation.ha: Idan kana son karin karsashi, ka yi amfani da damar samun wani abu da zai dau hankalinkaa

translation.en: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
translation.ha: watakila ka gano wani abun sha da za ka iya haɗawa domin karin kumallo yayin da ka dawo aikinka na yau da gobe.

translation.en: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
translation.ha: Idan kana zaune a cikin birni mai al'adun shaye-shaye iri-iri, je gidajen giya ko mashaya a unguwannin da ba ka yawan zuwa.

translation.en: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
translation.ha: Ga wadanda ba sa gane kalmomin da ake amfani da su a harkar likitancin, kalmomin ciwuka masu watsuwa da na masu yaduwa na da ma'anoni daban-daban.

translation.en: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
translation.ha: Wata cuta mai saurin yaduwa ita ce wacce kwayar cuta Pathogen ke haifarwa, kamar ƙwayoyin cuta, ƙwayoyin bakteria, fungus ko wasu ƙwayoyin cuta.

translation.en: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
translation.ha: Cuta mai saurin yaɗuwa cuta ce da ta ke da sauƙin yaduwa ta hanyar kasancewa a wurin da wanda ya kamu da cutar ya ke.

translation.en: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
translation.ha: Akasariin gwamnatoci na bukatar bakin dake shigowa ko kuma mazauna masu fita kasashensu da a yi musu rigakafin cuttutuka daban-daban.

translation.en: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
translation.ha: Yawanci wadannan dokokin zasu danganci kasar da matafiyin ya ziyarta ko ya ke shirin ziyarta.

translation.en: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
translation.ha: Daya daga manufofin masun karfi a Charlotte, North Carolina, ita ce cewa tana da wadataccen zaɓi mai inganci na iyalai.

translation.en: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
translation.ha: Mazauna daga waɗansu wuraren yawanci kan ambaci zumuncin iyalai a matsayin babban dalilin komawa wurin, kuma sau da yawa maziyarta kan ji daɗin birnin cikin sauƙi zagaye da yara.

translation.en: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
translation.ha: A shekaru 20 da suka wuce, yawan abokantakar yara a babban garin Charlotte ya karu sosai.

translation.en: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
translation.ha: Iyalai a garin Charlotte ba su cika amfani da motocin haya ba, amma su kan yi amfani da su a wasu lokutan.

translation.en: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
translation.ha: Akwai ƙarin don samun fasinjoji sama da 2, don haka wannan zaɓin na iya tsada fiye da yadda ake buƙata.

translation.en: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
translation.ha: Antarctica ce nahiya mafi sanyi a Duniya, wadda ta kewaye doron duniya na kudu.

translation.en: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
translation.ha: Ziyarar yawon shakatawa na da tsada, na bukatar lafiyar jiki, za a iya yin ta ne a lokacin rani kaɗai Nuwamba-Fabrairu, kuma mafi yawa an taƙaice su ga Tsallaken ruwa, Tsibirai da Tekun Ross.

translation.en: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
translation.ha: Wasu guda biyu dubatan ma'aikata suna zaune a nan a lokacin rani a cikin wasu tushe dozin guda hudu galibi a waɗannan yankuna; wani adadi dan kadan suna zama a lokacin sanyi.

translation.en: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
translation.ha: Kasar Antarctica wanda ke nesa daga teku gari ne da babu kowa a ciki, kankara ya rufe mai nisan km 2-3 ya rufe shi.

translation.en: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
translation.ha: Kwararru na wasu lokai kan tafiye-tafiyen jirgin sama nesa da teku, don hawan dutse ko isa zuwa Iyakanci Duniya, wanda ke da babban tushe.

translation.en: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
translation.ha: Hayar Layin Duniya na Kudu (ko Babbar Hanya) tsawon kilomita 1600 ne daga Tashar McMurdo akan Tekun Ross zuwa Layin duniyar.

translation.en: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
translation.ha: Matsatsen dusan kankara da tsagewa cike ciki da alaman tuta. Za a iya tafiyan da tractors na musamman, hauling sleds da mai da kayayyaki.

translation.en: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
translation.ha: Wadannan ba su da azama sosai saboda haka gwajin za ta dauki doguwar tafiya a kewayen dutsen Transantarctic don zuwa saman jigawan.

translation.en: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
translation.ha: Abin da ya fi haddasa hadura a lokacin hunturu shi ne kananan hanyoyi da hanyoyin da mutane ke bi a gefen titi musamman ma matattakala.

translation.en: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
translation.ha: Mafi karanci kana bukatar takalmi wanda ke da kasansa mai kwari. Takalman lokacin zafi yawanci su na sullubewa a kan kankara ko dusarta hatta wasu takalman na hunturu su na gazawa.

translation.en: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
translation.ha: Ya kamata tsarin ya sami isasshen zurfi, 5 mm (inci 1/5) ko fiye, kuma kayan aikin su kasance masu taushi a yanayin sanyi.

translation.en: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
translation.ha: Wasu takalman suna da ƙusoshi a ƙasansu kuma akwai abin ƙari mai ƙusoshi don yanayin santsi, wanda ya dace da yawancin takalma, domin dugadugai ko dugadugai da tafin kafa.

translation.en: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
translation.ha: Ya kamata wasu bayan tafin kafan takalma su yi kasa ko faɗi. Ana watsa yashi, tsakuwa ko gishiri (Calcium Chloride) a kan tituna ko hanyoyi don inganta kama ƙasa.

translation.en: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
translation.ha: Faduwar dusar kankara ba abu ne mara kyau ba; gangara na iya rikewar dusar kankara sosai, kuma yawancin kima za su sauko kamar faduwar dusar kankara.

translation.en: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
translation.ha: Matsalar ita ce dusar ƙanƙara na da danko, don haka yana buƙatar wasu abubuwan da za su iya saukowa su sauko, kuma wasu dusar ƙanƙara da ke saukowa na iya zama abin da ke haifar da sauran.

translation.en: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
translation.ha: Wasu lokuta asalin abin da ke haifar da shi shine hasken rana da ke sanya dusar ƙanƙara, wani lokacin wasu ƙarin dusar ƙanƙara, wani lokacin wasu al'amuran yanayi, sau da yawa ɗan adam.

translation.en: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
translation.ha: Mahaukaciyar guguwa kamar wani sunduki ne me jujjuyawa wanda ke kunshe da iska mai nauyi wadda ke zukar sauran iska da ke gefenta daga kasa ya yi sama.

translation.en: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
translation.ha: Suna samar da babban iska (yawanci 100-200 mil/awa) kuma na iya daga abu mai nauyi a iska, dauke da su yayinda iska mai nauyi na tafiya.

translation.en: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
translation.ha: Suna farawa ne daga wani abu kamar hayaki da ke sauka daga girgije sannan ya zama gajimare“Guguwa” yayin da suka taba kasa.

translation.en: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
translation.ha: Keɓaɓɓen VPN (cibiyar sadarwar masu zaman kansu) masu ba da hanya mai kyau hanya ce ta ƙetare takunkumin siyasa da kasuwancin IP-geofiltering.

translation.en: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
translation.ha: Sun fi wakilan gidan yanar-gizo bisa dalilai da yawa: Sun sake canja duk hanyoyin tafiyar intanet, ba http kawai ba.

translation.en: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
translation.ha: A ƙa’ida suna samar da zango mai ƙarfi da kuma aiki mai inganci. Rufaffu ne don haka suna da wuyar leƙen asiri.

translation.en: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
translation.ha: Yawanci kamfanonin yaɗa labarai kan yi ƙarya akan dalilin wannan, suna iƙirarin cewa domin “hana satar fasaha” ne.

translation.en: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
translation.ha: A gaskiya, tsarin yankuna basu da wani sakamako kan kwashewa ba bisa doka ba; kwashewa da aka yi da kyau a disk zai iya aiki daidai kan kowanne na’ura inda na asalin zai yi aiki.

translation.en: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
translation.ha: Ainihin manufar ita ce a baiwa waɗancan kamfanoni ikon sarrafa kasuwannin su; duk magana ce ta juya kudade.

translation.en: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
translation.ha: Saboda kiran waya kan biyo ta kan intanet, ba ka bukatar yin amfani da kamfanin waya da ke inda ka ke zama ko inda ka yi tafiya.

translation.en: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
translation.ha: Hakanan babu wata buƙatar cewa ku samu lambar gida daga yankin da ku ke zaune; za ku iya samun haɗin intanet mai tauraron dan adam a cikin dajin Chicken, Alaska kuma ku zaɓi wata lamba da ta ce kuna cikin yanayin Arizona na rana.

translation.en: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
translation.ha: Sau da yawa, dole ne ku sayi lambar duniya daban wanda zai ba wayoyin PSTN damar kiran ku. Inda adadin ya fito yana kawo canji ga mutanen da suke kiranka.

translation.en: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
translation.ha: Manhajoji masu fasara rubutu a kan lokaci – manhajoji waɗanda suke iya fasara dukkan ɓangarorin rubutu kai tsaye daga wani yare zuwa wani.

translation.en: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
translation.ha: Wasu daga cikin manahajar da ke wannan rukuni na iya fassarar rubutu a cikin yaren kasashen waje akan alamu ko wasu abubuwa a cikin ainihin duniyar lokacin da mai amfani ya nuna wayan kwakwalwa ta hanyar wadancan abubuwa.

translation.en: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
translation.ha: Injunan fassara sun inganta sosai, kuma yanzu sau da yawa suna ba da cikakkiyar ko fassara da ba ta kai ba (da kuma ƙarin ƙarancin shirme), amma ya dace a bada kulawa, saboda har yanzu suna iya yin hakan ba daidai ba.

translation.en: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin mahanaja mafi shahara shine Fasarar Google, wanda ke bada damar fasara ba kan yanar gizo ba bayan zazzagewar bayanan yaren wanda aka fi so.

translation.en: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
translation.ha: Amfani da manhajar GPS da ke nuna inda kake a kan wayar ka ta hannu zai iya kasancewa hanya mafi sauki da daɗin gane inda kake yayin da ka fita daga ƙasar ku.

translation.en: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
translation.ha: Zai iya adana kuɗi akan siyan sabbin taswira don GPS, ko na'urar GPS mai zaman kanta ko yin haya daga kamfanin haya na mota.

translation.en: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
translation.ha: Idan baka da kudin hawa yanar gizo a wayarka, ko ka yi nisa da network, ayyukansu zai iya zama takaitacce ko baya samuwa.

translation.en: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
translation.ha: Kowane kantin sayar da kusurwa yana cike da rudani game da katunan wayar da aka riga aka biya wadanda za'a iya amfani dasu daga wayoyin biya ko kuma wayoyin talakawa.

translation.en: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
translation.ha: Yayin da galibin kudin kira yake da kyau zuwa ko ina nema, wasu kuma sun kware wajen bayar da rangwamen kiran ga wasu zababbun kasashen duniya.

translation.en: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
translation.ha: Samun dama ga waɗannan ayyukan galibi ta hanyar lambar tarho kyauta ce wanda za a iya kira daga yawancin wayoyi ba tare da caji ba.

translation.en: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
translation.ha: Ana amfani da dokokin daukar hoto na yau da kullum a wajen daukar bidiyo, watakila ma fiye da na hoton.

translation.en: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
translation.ha: Idan kawai ba a yarda a ɗauki hoton wani abu ba, to kada ma ka ma yi tunanin yin rikodin bidiyo ɗinsa.

translation.en: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
translation.ha: Idan ana amfani da nau’rar hoto na jirgi, yana da kyua a lura kafin lokaci abubuwan da aka yarda da daukar hoton su da kuma me akwai izini ko ana bukatan karin lasisi.

translation.en: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
translation.ha: Shawagi da jirgi mai sarrafa kansa kusa da filin jiragen sama a kan taron jama’a kusan gurguwar fahimta ce, ko da ma bai ci karo da doka ba a yankin ku.

translation.en: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
translation.ha: Kwanakin nan ba a cika sayen tikitin jirgin sama kai tsaye ta hanyar kamfanin jiragen ba tare da an fara yin bincike tare da kwatanta farashin ba.

translation.en: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
translation.ha: Wani lokacin tafiyar jirgin sama ɗaya na iya samun farashi da suka bambanta sosai a wasu masu tarawa kuma ya dace a kwatanta sakamakon bincike a kuma duba shafin yanar gizo na kamfanin jirgin sama da kansa kafin biyan kuɗi.

translation.en: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
translation.ha: Yayin da ba lalle ne ka buƙaci biza don taƙaitattun ziyarar zuwa wasu ƙasashe a matsayin ɗan yawon shakatawa ko kasuwanci ba, tafiya can a matsayin dalibi na ƙasa da ƙasa yana buƙatar zama na dogon lokaci fiye da zuwa can kawai a matsayin ɗan yawon buɗe ido.

translation.en: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
translation.ha: Gabaɗaya, kasancewa a kowace ƙasar waje na tsawan lokaci na buƙatar ku sami takardar izini a gaba.

translation.en: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
translation.ha: Bizar ɗalibi a gaba ɗaya suna da abubuwan da a ke buƙatu da hanyoyin neman bizar da suka bambanta da bizar da aka saba ta yawon shakatawa ko asuwanci.

translation.en: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
translation.ha: A mafin yawancin kasashe, kana bukatar takardar shiga daga cibiyar da kake neman yin karatu tare da shaidar yawan kudi wanda zai taimaka wajen gudanar da karatun na akalla shekarar farko.

translation.en: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
translation.ha: Duba da cibiyoyi, tare da sashen jami'in shige da fice na kasar da kake neman yin karatu domin samun cikaken ka’idoji.

translation.en: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
translation.ha: Idan kai ba ma’aikacin diflomasiya ba ne, yin aiki a kasashen waje na nufin sai ka bayar da bayanan haraji na kudaden shigarka a kasar da kake zaune.

translation.en: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
translation.ha: Harajin kuɗin shiga an tsara su daban a cikin ƙasashe daban-daban, kuma ƙimar haraji da takunkumi sun bambanta sosai daga ƙasa zuwa ƙasa.

translation.en: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
translation.ha: A wasu ƙasashe na tarayya, kamar Amurka da Kanada, ana karɓar harajin samun kuɗaɗe a matakin tarayya da na ƙananan hukumomi, don haka ƙimar kuɗi da takunkumi na iya bambanta daga yanki zuwa yanki.

translation.en: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
translation.ha: Duk da yake rajistar shige da fice yawanci baya nan ko tsari idan ka isa kasarka, ikon kwastam na iya zama matsala.

translation.en: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
translation.ha: Tabbatar kun san abin da zaku iya shigowa da ba za ku iya shigowa ba kuma zayyana wani abu sama da iyakar doka.

translation.en: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
translation.ha: Hanya mafi sauki don farawa a harkar da rubuta labarin tafiye-tafiiye shi ne ta fitar da kwarewar ku akan wani shafin yanar-gizo na blog.

translation.en: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
translation.ha: Bayan kun sami kwanciyar hankali da tsarawa da yin gyara akan yanar gizo, sannan daga baya, kuna iya ƙirƙirar gidan yanar gizonku.

translation.en: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
translation.ha: Sadaukarwar sa-kai yayin da a ke tafiya babbar hanya ce ta kawo canji amma ba kawai batun bayarwa ba ne.

translation.en: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
translation.ha: Rayuwa da sadaukarwar sa-kai a ƙasar waje babbar hanya ce ta sanin wata al’ada ta daban, haɗuwa da sabbin mutane, sanin kanka, samun fahimtar hangen nesa har ma da samun sabbin dabaru.

translation.en: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
translation.ha: Yana iya zama hanya mai kyau na shimfida kasafin kudi domin ba da izini mai zurfi a wani wuri tunda yawancin aika na sa kai na ba da daki da katako da kankanin albashi.

translation.en: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
translation.ha: Vikings sun yi amfani da mashigan ruwa na Rasha don kaiwa tekun Black Sea da Tekun Caspian. Har yanzu ana iya amfani da sassa na waɗannan hanyoyi. Binciki yiwuwar samun izini na musamman, koda yake zai yi wahalar samuwa.

translation.en: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
translation.ha: Madatsar ruwa ta Tekun Baltic ta haɗe da Tekun Arctic zuwa Kogin Baltic, ta cikin Tabkin Onega, Tabkin Ladoga da a Saint Petersburg, yawanci ta ƙoramu ko tafkuna.

translation.en: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
translation.ha: Har ila yau, Lake Onega yana haɗi da Volga, saboda haka zuwa daga Tekun Caspian ta hanyar Rasha har yanzu yana yiwuwa.

translation.en: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
translation.ha: Ku tabbatar cewa da zarar kun isa Marinas komai zai zama a bayyane. Za ku haɗu da wasu masu satar jirgin ruwa kuma za su raba bayanansu tare da ku.

translation.en: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
translation.ha: Ainihin za ku iya sanya sanarwar bayar da taimakon ku, yin sassauci a kan tashoshin jiragen ruwa, kusantar mutane da tsabtace jirgin ruwan sa, kokarin yin hulɗa da masu jirgin ruwa a mashayar, da dai sauransu.

translation.en: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
translation.ha: Yi ƙoƙarin magana da mutane da dama. Bayan ɗan lokaci kowa zai san ka kuma za a baka labari akan kwale-kwalen da ke neman mutum.

translation.en: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
translation.ha: Ya kamata ku zaɓi kamfanin jirgin sama na yau da kullun a cikin ƙawance a hankali.

translation.en: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa tunani zai jawo ka wajen shiga jirgin da aka fi hawa, abun lura shine sanin cewa gatar da aka bayar wa sun bambanta kuma karamci na mai shaidar hawa akai-akai na iya bambanta a wani jirgi dake kawance daya.

translation.en: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
translation.ha: Jiragen sama kamar su Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways da Turkish Airlines sun kara fadada ayyukansu zuwa Afirka, kuma suna ba da sadarwa zuwa manyan biranen Afirka da dama a farashi mai rahusa fiye da sauran kamfanonin jiragen sama na Turai.

translation.en: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
translation.ha: Kamfanin Jiragen Saman Turkiya yana tashi zuwa wurare 39 a cikin kasashen Afirka 30 daga shekarar 2014.

translation.en: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
translation.ha: Idan kuna da ƙarin lokacin tafiya, ku duba ku ga yadda jimlar farashinku na zuwa Afirka ya in an kwatanta farashin zagayen-duniya ya ke.

translation.en: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
translation.ha: Kar a manta da kara a cikin karin farashin karin visa, harajin tashi, jigilar kasa, da sauransu. don dukkanin wuraren da ke wajen Afirka.

translation.en: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
translation.ha: Idan kana son zagaye duniya a jirgi gaba daya a sashen Kudancin duniya, zaɓin tashi jirage da wuraren zuwansu a takaice yake saboda rashin hanyoyin da ke bi ta cikin teku.

translation.en: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
translation.ha: Babu wani haɗin gwiwar kamfanin jiragen sama da ke ratsa tekuna uku da ke sashen kudancin duniya (kamfanin sky team basa bin layi ko guda a ciki)

translation.en: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
translation.ha: Koyaya, Star Alliance ta rufe komai banda gabashin Kudancin Pacific daga Santiago de Chile zuwa Tahiti, wanda ke jirgin LATAM Oneworld.

translation.en: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
translation.ha: Wannan jirgi ba shi ne kadai zabi ba idan kana so ka tsallake South Pacific da yankin bakin teku na yamman South America. (duba kasa).

translation.en: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
translation.ha: A 1994, yankin bagarencin Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh na Azerbaijan ta ja yaki da Azeris.

translation.en: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
translation.ha: Tare da taimakon Armenia, an kafa wata sabuwar jamhuriya. Ko da yake, babu wata daga cikin kasashen duniya da suka kafu - hatta ita Armenian kanta - ta amince da wanzuwar kasar/jamhuriyar.

translation.en: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
translation.ha: Muhawarar diflomasiya akan yankin ta cigaba da dagula dangantaka tsakanin Armenia da Azerbaijan.

translation.en: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
translation.ha: Gundumar Canal (Dutch: Grachtengordel) shahararriyar gunduma ce ta ƙarnin 17 da ke kewaye da Binnenstad na Amsterdam.

translation.en: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
translation.ha: An naɗa gaba ɗayan gundumar a matsayin wani Wurin Gado na Duniya na UNESCO don darajar al'ada da kuma tarihi mai irinta, da kuma darajojin kadararsa suna cikin mafi sama na ƙasar.

translation.en: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
translation.ha: Cinque Terre, wanda ke nufin Filaye Biyar, ya ƙunshi ƙananan karkara biyar na bakin teku na Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza da Monterosso waɗanda ke cikin yankin Liguria na Italiya.

translation.en: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
translation.ha: Su na cikin jerin sunayen wuraren tarihi na duniya na UNESCO.

translation.en: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
translation.ha: A ƙarni da yawa, mutane sun gina farfajiyoyi a kan tudu mai wahala, Tsayayyar wuri mai faɗi zuwa ƙwanƙolin dutsen da ke ƙetare tekun.

translation.en: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
translation.ha: Babban abin sha’awar shine rashin alama kururu ta zamanantarwa. Hanyoyi, jiragen kasa da kwale-kwale na sadar da kauyukan amma kuma motoci ba za su iya kaiwa can daga waje ba.

translation.en: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
translation.ha: Nau'o'in Faransanci waɗanda ake magana dasu a Belgium da Switzerland sun ɗan bambanta da Faransancin da ake magana dasu a Faransa, kodayake suna kama da juna don fahimtar juna.

translation.en: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
translation.ha: Musamman, tsarin kirgar lambobi a wajen wadanda ke yaren faransanci na kasar Belgium ya na da banbanci da yaren faransanci da ake magana da shi a Faransa,kuma yadda ake furta wasu kalmomin ya sha bambam.

translation.en: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, duka’yan Belgium masu magana da harshen Faransanci kuma da ‘yan Swiss za su zamana sun koyi karbabben Faransanci a makaranta, saboda su iya fahimtarka ko da ka yi amfani da tsarin rubuta lambobi na karɓaɓɓen Faransanci.

translation.en: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
translation.ha: A sassa da yawa na duniya, sallama alama ce ta abokantaka, mai nuna “sannu.”

translation.en: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
translation.ha: Sai dai kuma, a Malaysiya, aƙalla a tsakanin ‘yan kasar da ke yankunan karkara, yana nufin “taho nan.” irin alamar da zaka nuna kankan da babban dan yatsa, wato irin alamar da ake amfani da ita a wasu ƙasashen yamma, amma ana amfani da ita don wannan manufa ne kawai.

translation.en: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
translation.ha: Hakanan, wani matafiyin dan Burtaniya a Spaniya na iya kuskuren yin ban kwana da ya kunshi tafin hannunsa na kallo mai daga hannun (maimakon wanda ake dagawa hannun) wadda ke nufin barka da zuwa.

translation.en: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
translation.ha: Ƙarin harsuna wasu harsuna ne mara ainihi ko ginanne da aka ƙirƙira da niyyar sauƙaƙa sadarwa tsakanin mutane waɗanda sukan samun wuyar sadarwa idan ba haka ba.

translation.en: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
translation.ha: Ya bambanta da harshen Faransanci, waɗanda ke asalin yare ko asalin halitta waɗanda suka zama rinjaye saboda dalili ɗaya ko wata hanyar sadarwa a tsakanin masu magana da wasu yarukan.

translation.en: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
translation.ha: A zafin rana na yini, matafiya na iya ganin abubuwa masu kamanin ruwa daga nesa (ko wasu abubuwa dabam).

translation.en: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
translation.ha: Waɗannan kan iya zama masu haɗari idan matafiyin ya bi hasken, yana hasarar kuzari da ragowar ruwa a banza.

translation.en: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
translation.ha: Ko da mafi zafin hamada na iya zama da sanyi a cikin dare. Yanayin sanyin jiki sosai wato Hypothermia babban haɗari ne idan ba tare da sutura mai bada ɗumi ba.

translation.en: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
translation.ha: A lokacin rani, musamman, akwai buƙatar lura da sauro idan kun yanke shawarar yin tattakin kan dutse a dajin mai ruwan sama.

translation.en: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
translation.ha: Ko da kuna tuki ta cikin dajin yanki mai yanayin ruwan sama sosai, daƙiƙa kaɗan da ƙofofi a buɗe yayin da ku ke shiga cikin motar ya isa lokacin da sauro zai shiga motar tare da ku.

translation.en: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
translation.ha: Murar tsuntsaye, ko kuma avian influenza, na iya kama duka tsuntsaye da dabbobi masu shayarwa.

translation.en: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
translation.ha: An ba da rahoton samun matsalan kasa da dubu guda a jikin mutane, amma wasu daga ciki sun kasance masu tsanani.

translation.en: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
translation.ha: Yawancin wadanda su ka jibanci lamarin masu aikin kiwon kaji ne, amma kuma akwai hadari ga masu lura da tsuntsaye.

translation.en: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
translation.ha: Abun sani dangane da kasar Norway shine darewar kwarin da tsibiri dake haifar da tudu mai tsawo.

translation.en: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
translation.ha: Wadannan filayen galibi ana kiransu da “vidde” ma'ana sarari, buɗaɗɗen itace, sarari mara iyaka.

translation.en: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
translation.ha: A Rogaland da Agder ana kiransu “hei” ma'ana wani tsiro mara bishiya da ke budadden daji mai cike da ciyayi.

translation.en: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
translation.ha: Gilashin kankara ba su da ƙarfi, amma suna gangarowa daga dutsen. Wannan zai haifar da tsagewa, gurabe, wanda gadoji na dusar ƙanƙara ke iya rufe shi.

translation.en: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
translation.ha: Bango da rufi na kogunan kankara na iya rushewa kuma iya rufe hudoji.

translation.en: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
translation.ha: A kusuruwar kankarar sai wasu manyan daskararru suka zame, inda suka fadi kasa kuma watakila ma suka barbazu daga kusurwar.

translation.en: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
translation.ha: Kakar yawon shakatawa a tasoshin kan tuddu yawancibunƙasarta shine a lokacin bazara ta Indiya.

translation.en: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
translation.ha: Sai dai kuma, suna da wasu nau'ikan kyau da ɗaukar ido lokacin hunturu, yayin da yawancin tasoshin kan tudu su ke samun yawan dusar ƙanƙara kuma su ke samar da wasanni irin su gudun kan ƙanƙara da zarmiyar kan ƙanƙara.

translation.en: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
translation.ha: Kamfanonin jiragen sama kaɗan ne kawai ke ba da kudin tafiya makoki, waɗanda ke ɗan rage farashin tafiya na jana'iza na ƙarshe.

translation.en: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
translation.ha: Kamfanonin zirga-zirgar jiragen sama da ke samar da wannan sun haɗa da Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa don jiragen da ke tashi daga Amurka ko Canada, da kuma WestJet.

translation.en: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
translation.ha: A ko wace hali, dole sai ku siya tiketi ta afami da waya kai tsaye daga kamfanin jirgin saman.
